lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We're about to romance the shit out of you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Damn right.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Hopefully we're on TVs at Chili's and Applebee's all across the country.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Anyway, before we get started for tonight's episode, we have some quick announcements to get through. First and foremost, our fantastic returning sponsor and friend of the show since the beginning of this campaign, D&D Beyond. Sam.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Mi amor

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Fuego! En fuego!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: One more stanza! On your iPad, please keep my heart's stats and treasure. D&D Beyond, I promise I'll subscribe to you forever.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: So pregnant right now.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Wow.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Also, they wanted me to say that they have a new Discord server, where the community can gather to talk about all things Dungeons & Dragons. Check it out at dndbeyond.com/discord.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Discord. Thank you very much, Samuel. Wow, there are a number of spells I will never be able to think of the right way again.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I cast Col... (stammering)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (stammering) ...or Spray.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Her episode is next Monday at 7:00pm Pacific here at twitch.tv/criticalrole, so look for that on Monday.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Her interview is so good! So good.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: She's so wonderful.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Super stoked for that. Tickets for autographs and photo ops are still available. You can go to our website at critrole.com/events for all the details on how to get that rolling.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Also Sam's going to be on Pub Draw next week.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Apparently there's a show on our channel called Pub Draw.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm going to be taught how to draw, and simultaneously, I'll watch the show for the first time.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I feel sorry for Babs, having to work with that.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, did we test her with someone like Sam already? We don't want to warm her up with someone a little better?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Well, she managed Laura and avoiding drawing penises, so--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I only drew two penises.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It was pretty good!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay. I remember Sam's campaign one contributions, and boy, they were something.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Laura, do you have some merch updates you want to talk about?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, well, our amazing art prints and stuff that are in the store right now for pre-order? They're still there for pre-order. They're going to be there until next week at 11:59pm on February 21st, Pacific time.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: So ominous!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You've got a whole other week to put that order in. You can get to them on our shop.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: These are unsigned posters! These are signed posters!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: They're beautiful.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: They really are amazing.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: shop.critrole.com or shop.critrole.co.uk, if you are across the pond. There's also T-shirts and stuff. They were restocked, so some other stuff might be in the store right now. Yay!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Brilliant. Thank you, Laura.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: God, I am so bad at announcements.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I disagree! It is adorable.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Thanks, guys.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No worries. Before we jump in, I've gotten a little crafty in my free time recently. I've shown a few of you, but-- because keeping track of potions is always a pain in the ass. I told you about this. I've seen some people have tweeted out different variations they've done for physical healing potions. I went and got some red resin, and I made some healing potions with red d4s in there. When we're doing the intro, I'll pass these out to you guys. Here, I've got some greater healing potions and the regular healing potions.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Nobody has any greater, right?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Not yet?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I have a potion of healing.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That being the case, let's jump in to tonight's episode of Critical Role!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (shouting) How do you play D&D? [water bubbling] [thunder] [explosion] (chanting) Role! Critical! Role! [dramatic Critical Role theme]

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Villains beware 'cause you're about to be dead.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: (singing) They got magic and flair, they got falchions and cunning. They don't see over there there's a monster incoming. Inspiration is waiting, rise up, don't think twice. Put your fate in your hands, take a chance, roll the dice! (chanting) Role! Critical! Role!

lines.name: ASHLEY, LAURA
lines.text: (singing) Can you answer the call? Diggin' deep in your soul as the legend unfolds. Now it's your turn to roll! [fire burning]

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Welcome back. Last we left off, the Mighty Nein had discovered that an important individual in the past history of Nott the Brave, the husband from a previous life, it seems, had gotten wrapped up in some of the chaos and the conflict between the Empire and the Kryn Dynasty. There was an attack on Felderwin in the Tillage, and it seems that this individual was taken eastward, towards Xhorhas. You managed to find the collapsed tunnel that they had used to surprise Felderwin, tunneled your way through that barrier, and then continued to follow this pathway back eastward to pursue where they may have taken him. While you've gone through, skirting the top of the Underdark of Wildemount, you managed to come in contact and save yourself from a battle with a couple of ropers amongst the caverns below. You found yourself suddenly in the center of a network of kobold tunnels, and in doing so, talked your way out of a possible conflict. Made a new friend and ally named Spurt, who was a nice and excitable inventor who wanted to show you the way through the tunnels, here towards the end of his life, it seemed.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: 11 days!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: In this one moment, as you begin to rush down this small hallway, hearing the slamming of the hammer behind you trying to break its way into the tunnel where you've all escaped, you continue charging into the darkness ahead.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Happy Valentine's Day, I guess?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What would you like to do?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Let's tend to you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (groaning)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I start to pat your burns.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Pat my burns?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What do we do? You two! This doesn't do anything!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, no, he's right. Whenever there's a severe burn, you pat the wound. You smack it. You take your bare hand and place it on the wound.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I pour this--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I would save that potion.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Your filthy hand, place it on my exposed skin.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Why are you going to use that right away? I know it's really cool looking, but seriously, I have spells.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What, you mean this thing?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, don't use that yet. Here, I'm going to cast--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well, nobody's doing anything, so--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm casting Cure Wounds!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (sigh of relief)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'll see if I have it at second level. I do. I'm going to cast it at second level.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You're doing okay, though, right?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm alive.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: What are you at?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Point of order, DM. In the last game, because I forget things, I thought I had three level four spells, but I only had two. I cast three times. What I'd like to do is burn my 3rd-level slots entirely for whatever happens.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sure, there you go.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: What time is it right now? When is it time to sleep?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (whispering) Self-flagellation.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Whenever we want to. We're underground.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: 13 points of healing.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: What I'm saying is, are we starting to get tired or not?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I think we would all appreciate a rest of any variety after those--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, I shouldn't have used my healing, then, if we're going to rest. That's stupid. I'm so dumb.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, it helped me, so thank you.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We haven't put up a dome or nothing.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I would have kept going.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We should keep going.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: For a little while. Let's pull one more healing, why don't we. Anybody else hurting?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How are you, Fjord? You got hit, too, didn't you?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, I think I got bit by a cow, actually.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, that's right.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yep. I could use a little loving.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Was it a bad bite?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: The fucking teeth, man, yeah! They're cows; they're shitty! All they do is chew all day.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Don't they have flat teeth for grinding?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, but the pressure, right? That is a big skull. If you think about it, per square inch, it's a motherfucker.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: If we've got a second, I can cast Prayer of Healing and do a little bit of--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, I don't know if I have that one prepared.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, it's cool, yeah. Just heal Nott. It's fine.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: If we have ten minutes, if we're going to take a quick breather, I'll cast Prayer of Healing.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so roll for Prayer of Healing.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Just cow bit. No big deal.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's just a little cow bite. I mean, we've all been bitten by cows before, haven't we?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's 16 hit points to whoever wants it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: 16 to anybody. 16.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'll take it!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Almost there, almost.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Thank you, Ducey.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Good job, Caduceus.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Eh, no problem.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: So we're pushing on? We're not going back to explore the black citadel of mystery and darkness?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I don't know how we would get over there with all the giants and stuff.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It seemed pretty far, but it was interesting.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Hey, Caleb, do you have any extra arm wraps? Seems mine evaporated in the lava.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Not the bracers though, are good, yeah?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No, bracers are good. They're a little janky on my wrists now, though. Wraps were padding them out.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I have enough for three sets of arms.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Are they clean?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Ja

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, okay.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (whispering) You should smell them first.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: How long have we known each other for?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: They smell all right?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: A while.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Do I still smell?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, no, no, but you know, things that are on your hands for a while, if they're real tight and stuff, they can smell.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, they smell like vinegar after a bit.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, yeah, yeah.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Those were in my bag.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Balsamic.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, well that's good, then.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Balls-samic?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I go and smell Caleb's hands.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a constitution saving throw. No.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I got 19 with the last one I rolled, so that's great.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're fine, you're fine.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: These are on fire on a regular basis.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, right, they should be fucking bacteria-free.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: A hint of mesquite.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Kind of like a campfire. I like it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, you.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Does the tunnel we're in now, now that we're on the other side of this shitshow, appear the same as it did the previous portion?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It does. At this moment, it's still really warm. From the running, the activity, and the general heat of the surrounding rock, now knowing the volcanic activity that runs parallel, or at least in the vicinity of these chambers, you're all sweating pretty profusely and it's uncomfortable. The tunnel itself still continues onward, the same ten-foot diameter, cylindrical tube. There are still occasional bits of broken obsidian and other types of porous volcanic rock that are broken and more torn through as part of the burrowing of this worm entity. You can see, still, some of the tracks of the various Kryn soldiers following behind it, so you're on the right track still.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Good to push on until our wizard tells us what time it is to sleep?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sure.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What time is it? Did you already check-- think? What time is it?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I don't remember. Reality was two weeks ago.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I would say at this moment, mid-afternoon.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Hey, she asked, man.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I know. Oh, I know. It's been two weeks for me, too.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Would you say it's 4:20-ish?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sure.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Great.

lines.name: LAURA, SAM
lines.text: Nice.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do the tracks on the ground, do they look fresh, do they look like they've been there for a while, is it hard to say?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make an investigation check.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Natural 19, for a 24.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nice.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That was the nerdiest I've ever heard you sound while saying a number.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (nasally) Um, a natural 19.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There isn't a lot of weather that transpires, there isn't a lot of wind or things that can brush aside or eventually cast away these tracks, so it's hard to really tell the specifics, but based on the travel, the speed they seem to be going, and how long ago this transpired, you gather they're probably a little over a week old.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We push on!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Ah!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Did I startle you?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. Continuing on for the next few hours, who's holding front watch? Are we keeping with the same order as last time?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'll watch!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I will, too!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, me and you, Nott. Our keen eyes will see everything.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'll keep towards the back, keep an eye on what's behind us.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. I'd like you both to make perception checks, please.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Very nice. Traversing for the next few hours, the tunnel begins to slowly come to an incline. For as much as it's been steadily delving, it's slowly beginning to curve in an upward fashion.The temperature begins to subside a bit. The warmth begins to become a little more comfortable by comparison. A few more hours of travel and eventually you find yourselves getting a bit tired, the exhaustion of the day's activities and the perpetual travel through this tunnel slowly beginning to catch up to you. You can continue to press on if you like, or you could attempt to bed down for the night.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I think we should bed down.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And another healing spell before we go to sleep, just to top everybody as close off as possible.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I can send another message to Yeza if you want me to.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Didn't you do that once today already?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I can do it again.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay. But last time, didn't he say that he was in a place where he couldn't talk?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, well, maybe he's moved. You know, we've been traveling for eight or ten hours or something, Caleb would know, but something long.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Also, you could ask yes or no questions and have him cough or sneeze.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Cough once for yes.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, but that's a real-- okay. What should I ask? I'll say cough once for yes, cough twice for no, that's already so many words, though!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Are you moving, I guess, would be-- are you still in the same place?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Any landmarks, maybe?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, that's not a coughing question.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes, there are landmarks. Shit! Describe them in coughs!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Are they moving you? Cough once for yes, twice for no.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: This is weird.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to cast Sending.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Or just speak, if you can speak.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, well, I figure he'll do that if he can.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: 25 hit points to anybody who wants it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: All the way up, that's beautiful, okay.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, I'm going to cast Sending.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, you're sending it to--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeza.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeza. Okay.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (clears throat) Hi! Cough once for yes, twice for no. Are they moving you? ...Are you safe?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Two questions? Oh, no! No! No!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: If he coughs twice is that two yeses? What if he coughs three times? Is the first one a yes or the last one a yes?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (laughing) I love the panic so you fixed it with a second question! You should've just sent it!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You have to use the whole message.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, you have to use all the words!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Otherwise it's a waste.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There's a long pause. You can almost hear Yeza going, "Uh?"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh god.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (coughs twice)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Was it one yes or two yes?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Jesus, it's only your husband!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Wait!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (coughs once)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: One, two, three. Is two, is two yes?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: They're not moving him, and what was the second question?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Are you safe?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And he said yes! They're not moving him and he's safe!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's good. This is the best it could've possibly gone.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Totally!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Was that once for yes? Twice for no?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, once for yes, twice for no. Two times, he said he's not moving. One time, he said he's safe.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Was it are they moving you or did you move?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I said, "Are they moving you?"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Okay, I don't remember.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, I can do it one more time. I can send him another message. What should I ask him?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't know, because he doesn't know where he is.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Right.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Maybe if he's surrounded by a bunch of people. Like, are we walking into an ambush?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Are they always watching you?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Always watching you, that's really good! Okay, okay, okay.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Or cough for how many people are watching you, maybe?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's really smart. Okay, I'm going to send it again.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Amazing, okay.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Aww, wow.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So good.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Jester, remember, you can cut it short, you don't have to fill all 25 words.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I think you have to say it all or else the spell doesn't work.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: She is a magic user.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I know these things.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: She's not the only one, but it's okay.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do you cast Sending? Did you want to send a message to Yeza?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, I'll do it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (gasps) Can you do it?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, you want me to do it?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You can reply to this message. Nobody's there.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You're a dick.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I don't believe him.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Really?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to cast Sending.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Ask if Fjord was bullshitting or not.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay. Okay, I'm going to say--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Don't burn your words for that!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Don't say that? Okay. Hi again! Hey, can you cough for how many people are watching you? That's all.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: This is Jester, signing off!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You know, Fjord's got a good point, anyone who has Sending--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (coughs three times)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Three people, three people are watching him! We can kill three people, that's fine.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sure, sure. Yes.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Depends on who the three people are, but yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, that's true.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, if it's three more fire giants, fuck, we in trouble.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Or three wizards.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Let's think optimistically, since it's the love of my life, and think that it's someone that we can defeat.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's probably three lazy guards watching prisoners that they think are not going to be able to escape.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Don't trust them with protecting anyone.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, my husband's actually pretty important, so I wouldn't--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Didn't you say he's not a fighter, though? So probably not a very violent--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I think they'd put someone on him who's pretty capable. I mean, he's a very smart man and, even though he's not a fighter-- let's say they're mid-level, all right? Mid to high. Takeable! But not so low that it's an insult.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: If you're going to talk for a while, I'm going to put up the dome.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Are we bribing these people? They're on the take? Takeable?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah. Or killing them. We're probably going to kill them.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: All options are on the table.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Kill them!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you guys are setting up a campsite here, utilizing your dome as well?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What does the surrounding passage look like where we are? Is it rough-hewn?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's the same burrowed pathway you've been following most of this journey. At this point, you've been following almost exclusively the burrowed trail of this worm creature as it's tore through this obsidian, subterranean portion of the Ashkeeper Peaks. Where you are right now, the amounts of volcanic rock seem to have dwindled as the tunnel begins to curve itself in an upward incline.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Do we want to do the same little trick, you and I?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, we can. Let me take a look at that, I have that somewhere. Yeah, I can do that.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You dig a little bit to the side and I will throw up the dome.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I make a little bit of room, use it to cover us.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. You guys all curl up for the evening's rest exhausted, sweaty, and looking forward to a number of hours where you don't have your mind bent on whatever dark space you've thrust yourself into this past week. Yes?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I also spend an hour bringing my cat back.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. You bring Frumpkin back. Does anyone want to keep watch, or are you all feeling pretty comfy to sleep within the dome?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I will take first watch.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty. While the rest of you are resting, Fjord, make a perception check for me, please.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. As the evening progresses, whether it be the proximity to the subterranean region of this mountain or the fact that you are rising up from the portions of the tunnel that seem to skirt the Underdark, nothing seems to find its way to you that's a bother. Uneventful evening for the watch that you take. Anybody take a second watch?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'll take second watch.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I will stay up as well.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The two of you, make perception checks while Fjord finishes out the evening's rest.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Ten.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You see these extended arms that end in these hooks. As it crawls its way across the ceiling, its shell almost scrapes the top of the dome.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh my gosh! I'm drawing in the sketchbook.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Continues scrambling past and further down the tunnel.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You saw something that looked like that?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, it crossed right overhead of us.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I don't like that.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Have you ever seen anything like that before?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I draw googly eyes on it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That makes it a little more palatable.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, it's not as scary anymore, huh?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's kind of cute now.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Are you awake?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, wait, no. I thought this was morning.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Level of exhaustion!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Beau's talking in her sleep.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I use Thaumaturgy to make it sound like the nice sound of rainfall, so that Beau will be able to go back to sleep.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, lovely!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Now that's a good use of a cantrip. Other than that, the evening's uneventful, but you did watch this hook-armed-like, beaked creature crawl its way past you and make its way deeper in towards the mountain base.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (whispering) Caleb! I don't really think that you're stinky. Just so you know. I mean, I did, but I don't anymore. You don't smell bad. You should know.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You can keep the running gag going, if you like.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Only if it doesn't make you uncomfortable.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No. It made me uncomfortable at first, but now I know you pretty well, so it's fine.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, good.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Plus it was hot back there, so now these do-- I was sweating.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, I can smell your armpits.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: There's nothing to hide now, so I will put those away.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The rest of you come to consciousness, long rest completed. You can mark that for your characters, healed and recovered. Continuing your journey--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm sorry. Because I didn't think we'd go right to sleep, so instead of taking out 3rd-levels, I'm going to cross off one 4th-level for the next chunk of time.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Why are you doing this?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I used too many powerful spells last game.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Liam likes to punish himself.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We all know this about him.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: How did you know you did that?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: There's this thing called the internet.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, got it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: They point out things that you do wrong, sometimes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Every now and then.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Ignore that thing. It's way more fun.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Does anybody want one of these chocolates? They're very good.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yes, I do. Happy Valentine's Day!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Good catch.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I bet that looked really good on the split screen.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You caught that manly.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: She threw it right to my hand.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I know, but it looked so studly the way you caught it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You okay, Sam? Need a moment?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I have a little bit of a boner.

lines.name: MATT, LAURA
lines.text: Happy Valentine's Day.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Coming to consciousness, gathering yourselves, the journey continues.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (whispering) Where's the candy?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I don't know where the candy is.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: There's one hidden behind--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We've lost a Laura.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Keep going, Matt! Keep going!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Ooh, there's a whole pack!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's dangerous.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You want some?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, I'm good.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Dungeons & Dragons, folks. Snacks!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Pushing onward--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Just as slick as your husband.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's almost becoming a vertical tunnel.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Ooh, that's not good.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It sucks.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: To continue, I would like the entire party, Yasha included, to make an athletics check, please.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can Nugget blink and go blink, blink, blink, as he climbs? He's probably pretty agile.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He's agile, but at a certain point, he's going to have to hold onto somebody because it's going to become vertical. Dogs don't really have a good climbing grip.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I wonder, if Yasha can climb super well, if--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Let's also maybe tie rope, if we're going to be doing--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: From one to the other?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So if one person falls, everybody falls! I like it!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Thank you. Wait--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We're a team!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Is that what happens?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't like that idea.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You need to have an anchor point for that to work.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yasha!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You don't want her to be the anchor point.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to hook Nugget-- I'm going to take my cloak off. I'm going to tuck Sprinkle into my shirt, and then I'm going to bring my cloak around Nugget and hook it around my shoulders so that he's like a messenger bag on me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. A blink dog messenger bag.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah. Then I'm going to climb up.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That dog is confused.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He likes it!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He seems confused, and he likes it. Going across, we have--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yasha got a 14. Fjord got an eight.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Ten.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Sechs

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh no. An eight.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: An 18.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can see light, a little point of light in the direction you're beginning to climb, suddenly begin to come into view from underneath the curving roof.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Please don't be a privy. It's a pooper.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Little peephole.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're not quite sure the distance of it. You're not sure the size of it. You see a point of light.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Are we going to come out and we're going to be amongst all of the bad guys?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Maybe, or maybe it's a forest. You don't know.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh my gosh! (grunting)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Are you leading the charge?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, I'm making efforts because it's hard.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'll take the front with somebody.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, Yasha and Caduceus will do it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Cool. Who's after them?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I will go right behind them.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so everyone behind Caleb... (laughs) Caleb, making your way up, the wraps-- have you rewrapped yourself?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No. Nothing to hide anymore.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You reach out and grab the side, and your fingers hit loose gravel, and you scrape back. The rest of you behind look up and watch Caleb go, "Whoa!" and begin to fall in your direction.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can I try to catch him?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Unfortunately, you're a little bit too far away. You and Caduceus are up ahead of him--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, no, I was not ahead. I was behind Caleb. It was Yasha and Caduceus.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a strength check to try to grab and hold on.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Can I ask-- Oh, to catch me from not even falling at all?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: To catch you from

lines.name: SAM, LAURA
lines.text: It's a cocked 20.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's cocked!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Roll again.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Somebody's going to have to support, or they're both going to go down here. Below them, who's going to help?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'll reach out and try to help.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'll make an arm brace with Fjord on the other side.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, clothesline.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: This is stupid!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You take a moment to right yourselves and get back into a steady position, eventually getting Caleb back on the trail.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I put him right next to me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You continue, but the DC is jumping with each pass now, especially as the exhaustion kicks in. Continuing the path, I'd like everyone to make another athletics check, please.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (singing) Kryptonite! Nope.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yasha rolled a 20. Fjord rolled a 17.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Ten.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Eight.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Everyone?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, no. The DC went up to a 12.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, so just me and you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You continue up, and the light gets brighter and closer. It's hard to make out a color because it looks like white, but it's not super bright. It would be a dull daylight. You get the sense that this may indeed be an approaching exit. I would like one third and final group athletics check.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I have a question. On the wall, if we were to look down, about how far down would we fall, if we were to fall at this point? If we had to guess?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: How far does your darkvision go?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: 60 feet.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It goes past your 60 feet. Tumbling down, it's not a complete fall. It would be a Homer Simpson down the side of the cliff.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: "As you wish."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, basically.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: With stone and obsidian.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It would be a few hundred feet.

lines.name: LAURA, MARISHA
lines.text: Ooh!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Good good. Good! Let's roll this shit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Let's roll your final group athletics check.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (laughing) Dancing on 19, and it went to three.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh no!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yasha rolled a 25. Fjord rolled a five.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Vier

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Ten.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There is a bit of air starting to catch to you as the opening begins to approach you: 100 feet, 50 feet, 30 feet. It's causing the sweat on your brow to feel really cold and freezing against your skin, until eventually, as-- you're near the front, as is Yasha. What would you guys like to do as you approach the exit?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I cast Pass Without a Trace as we get close.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (gravelly voice) I'm very carefully going to scan the surroundings, listen for any noise. I'm going to slowly make my way up.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (clears throat loudly) (laughter)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yasha will.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can see a portion of rope that was tied to it, that has since been severed, and there's some dangling threads at the edge of that.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I don't know. I started with me, then her--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: If Caduceus is listening intently, he is barely hearing Caleb mouth the words to the Feather Fall spell like an actor running lines, which he's been doing for the last 30 minutes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Are you just listening?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm slowly creeping up and listening, and taking in everything, seeing what--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: To your left as you look up, you can see the ominous, rising peaks of the the Ashkeeper Peaks themselves. You can see that you are at the base of where the mountains begin to slowly grade into the wastes, which you see to your right. There are dead trees. Whether it be they themselves are bereft of life, or they've lost their leaves to the season, you're not familiar with this territory to know-- yet. You can see clusters of rock and stone and areas where whatever force created these mountains has caused bits of it to jut outward, causing small cliff faces and stone protrusions that mar the base of the mountainscape here before you. You can see where strange types of roots and small bushes have tried to affix themselves to the edges of these stones, and then have dried up as the wastes themselves go through the dark and ashen seasons. Looking beyond that, you can see the open valley below and before you: a dry, cracked, badlands with hints of scrub brush and other types of hardy vegetation that has managed to find a life here. What did you roll for perception, again?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I didn't roll perception.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's right, that's just you taking in the scenery. Now roll a perception check.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Is Cad up there solo at this point?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You send Frumpkin up to look?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You do see, in the distance in the valley, a few shapes far away, far past the mountain range, very large creatures of some kind stalking slowly across. Far away, miles away.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Does Yasha recognize them?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yasha doesn't see this yet. Yasha is just peeking up. Roll a perception check for Yasha.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, I was going to say, any signs of beast nor man? Life or technology?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: A natural 20.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Really?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Sexy CR dice.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "It's probably best to avoid those. They can bear "quite a bit of meat, but they're a bit of a tussle."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well, if you think so. Are we safe? Can we bring everybody up?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I mean, it's either that or stay inside."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I've missed the sky. I think we can come up, everybody. Just be careful.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Is there any cover nearby once we poke our head up out there that you can see?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: This doesn't seem to be much of a coverage territory.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay. Anything in the skies?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You look up. You can see a few hawks, maybe birds of prey, but nothing at the moment that catches your attention.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And this never stopped being the worm's path,

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Are there any signs of where the worm went across this open land?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Did you climb out?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I thought we all-- yes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. You all climb out.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Stealthily, sure.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a survival check to see if you can locate the tracks here.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Been rolling real well tonight. Eight.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Welcome to the eastern side in Eastern Wynandir.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Welcome to Xhorhasic Park.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Fuck!

lines.name: TRAVIS, MARISHA, TALIESIN
lines.text: (humming off-key Jurassic Park theme)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What was that discordant mess? Jeez. We all jumped into different parts of the score!

lines.name: TRAVIS, MARISHA
lines.text: (purposefully humming off-key Jurassic Park theme)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (sighs) Glad we had that moment.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Talking to Yasha: Is this what you are accustomed to from home?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I mean, yes. I'm not from this area, specifically, but these are the wastes."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I think you are our guide, all the same.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There's a valley or gorge between the teeth-like Bluffs and the Ashkeeper range. There's a strange thing visible to you. Amongst the open, daylight-gray sky, right there in that valley, is pitch night.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's where Ghor Dranas is.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do we know that it's engulfed in darkness?

lines.name: LIAM, LAURA
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's unnatural darkness?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a nature check.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Why this is an intelligence-based thing is beyond me, but here we go. No. That's a one. I rolled a two, which means it's a one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. You have no idea where you are.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's fair.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Or what that might be and what direction it could be.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's crazy.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What is?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That thing.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Didn't we hear that the darkness was expanding?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We heard Ghor Dranas was always dark.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I feel like we heard that the darkness was expanding somewhere.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yasha pipes in and goes, "Ghor Dranas is further east."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, really?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's not it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "No, this is right on the border of the Empire."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Well, that's promising.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: So whatever darkness is creeping farther than the capital?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I suppose."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh shit.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Does it look localized, or does it look like it starts and then it's ever-expanding?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It looks localized. It's like there's a strange sphere of shadow that is encompassing that entire valley in the center of the mountains.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So a dome, from our perspective?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How far away is it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You don't see necessarily a dome. What you see is the mountain, and the cliffs, and the ground around just goes into shadow. It's a very strange--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Like someone erased the world?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, went over it with a marker.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Whoa. That's crazy.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: How many days' walk is it from here, do you think?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: From there, you'd probably guess it's somewhere-- let me see here. From where you emerged, probably about two days.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Two days?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: To the darkness?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Looking at the map, you can gather the path of the Ashkeeper Peaks, and where the Brokenveil Bluffs are, that gorge, that valley where you see that dark spot, is the Ashguard Garrison. As you begin to focus and look out there, you can see that texture within there that looked like a forest is not, because there are points of light in it. There are, you can just barely see at the very edge of the horizon before you get to that mountain range, what you can gather to be tents, structures of some kind.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Does it look like a military front?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's too far to see, but the last you word you had was the Ashguard Garrison had fallen to the Kryn Dynasty and was currently held by them.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And the Xhorhasian agent that we tussled with in the sewers was able to make darkness on the spot, so it is a tactic they are able to use.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: A whole bunch of them together could make a lot of darkness.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We should get closer.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Should we?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you guys are having this conversation--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I love this!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Whoa, secrets!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What? How are there secrets already? He didn't do anything! He doesn't deserve this one.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: D&D Beyond has a Discord.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It does. D&D Beyond is great, I love them, but Laura, what are the artists' names who did those beautiful art prints?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Matteo Scalera and Moreno Dinisio.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Okay. Really quickly, just for fun, I'm going to cast Blindness.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: On whom?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: A guy.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: A guy? What guy?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's a constitution save, 16.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Natural 20.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: He didn't.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Natural 20 on the save, yeah.

lines.name: SAM, LAURA
lines.text: Who?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, exactly.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Did we see what Caduceus was doing?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I was just casting a spell at somebody.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys turn and look over, and a little ways up, maybe 30, 40 feet from where you are, from a cliff-like outcropping, maybe a small ten-, 15-foot cliff, a gray-cloaked and hooded figure that's standing there with one hand up.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: One hand up, like this, palm out?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Palm out.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yasha, in your culture, does that mean, "I'm going to kill you," or "please don't kill me"?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yasha goes, "In my culture we just kill if need be. There's no pleasantries."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm going to use Misty Step to bamf right to him.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's cool.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. You appear right in front and the figure flinches as you do, and the hand instinctually looks to be probably going for a blade inside the cloak and holds it there.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I summon the falchion. Who are you and what do you want?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The figure reaches up and pulls the hood back a bit. You see a bald human. Big, bushy, black and gray beard, face covered with streaks of mud. Looks to be a well-armored-- leather, studded leathers-- figure. Looks to you with these very piercing, blue-gray eyes, taking your check and doesn't crumble under it. Holds the line and looks back at you and says, "Hey, what are you doing out here? You don't look like soldiers."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We're not. We're a rescue party.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "What you coming to rescue?"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: A friend. What about you? Lonely place to be up on the side of a mountain all by yourself.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Come, let's get out of the open, at least, if we're going to talk."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You have others with you?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I do."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: How many?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He whistles a little bit, and in the surrounding rocks above, about ten other figures with similar gray cloaks all emerge, many of them with shortbows and longbows, arrows nocked but not drawn yet.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's pretty cool.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I motion to the rest. Let's go. This way.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Are they nice? Is it nice people?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It it the sand people?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: The sand people?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is it the sand people?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "All right, so I'm Kaulden."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is that with a C or with a K?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "It's with a K."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Got it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I'm the captain of the Muck Men, the small band of scouts and rangers you see here. We're up "from Bladegarden."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That means something to you?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Bladegarden is right here.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That means they're not from Xhorhas, is what it means.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, wow.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: On the other side of the Peaks.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "You shouldn't be wandering around here in a war zone. You know that, right?"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Indeed.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We didn't have a choice.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We are far, far from home. As I said, we're a rescue party. It's a matter of necessity, I'm afraid.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "This one you're rescuing, whereabouts are they?"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That we don't know.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We think they're in Ghor Dranas?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Or maybe in that dark city over there, maybe?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Ooh, you'd probably have a better time in Ghor Dranas right now."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Did you happen to see any higher-echelon-looking mage folk come through, maybe a week or two ago?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Maybe with a big worm?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Purple worm, real big.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "We've seen a worm move through, about a week and a half ago. Went far east, straight "across the plain."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Towards that dark place?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "No, that's northward. This went eastward."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: To probably Ghor Dranas, yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is that toward Ghor Dranas?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "As far as I know, that's probably where it was headed."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That would be the direction we're supposed to go.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What can you tell us of the war?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "It's been quiet to an uncomfortable degree. After all these months of violence and death, to just be "holding the line makes me uncomfortable. Makes me wonder what they're waiting for. That's what we've "been doing, and a few other troops: keeping an eye, taking a tally on what's being planned."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You know what happened at the other end of this tunnel, or has word not traveled yet?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I have an idea. What's this? Was this made by that worm?"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well, yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: They dug into a town called Felderwin, and they raided it and took prisoners.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We'll see what we can do to maybe escort you back "into the Empire."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, we're not going back. We're going to pursue the one that we're trying to rescue across the--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Just the seven of you?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You're welcome to join us.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughs) "I'm not stupid, but thanks."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "They tend to move best under the shadow. Sun doesn't really behoove them well. It's a bit "difficult if they're bringing the night with them wherever they go."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Does it move with them, or does that area of darkness stay in one place?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "As far as I know, since that darkness opened when they took the garrison, it's been "there ever since."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Interesting.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Right, so we go under the darkness, rid them of that spell, and we'll be lickety-split out of there no problem.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We're not going to the garrison. We're going to rescue Yeza.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm being sarcastic, Jester.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We will have to deal with this problem further into Xhorhas. Do you have any tips for a bunch of crazy assholes going into the enemy's country?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It could be a forest, but he points it out to be a marshland. "If you're looking to cross the river, "heading up that way, just be careful. Gets wide at some points. Gets a little thinner at others, but "it's still crossing a river."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Know if there's any way to buy some horses or some such?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I mean, unless you want to go and wander into one of the various Xhorhasian towns and buy "off a horse or three, good luck."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Everybody got to eat.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Anyway."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Would that darkened area that we're not going to-- what is it called? Is that Ashguard?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "That's the Ashguard, aye. Well, if you're going to go off and be fools that side of this "land, do you need any supplies?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What do you have? Yes, give us anything you have.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes, give us, for free, anything that you have.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I would love that. So nice of you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Aye. Hold here a second." He walks out of the alcove and heads out into the space where the rest of his Muck Men are. Steps up onto this one piece of stone and gives a little whistle to the rest of the troop. They all stand up, and he looks back to you and beckons for you to start to head over to where they are. At which point you see something go (soft whistle) through the air, something shift real fast. You watch him double over onto one knee. You can see the edge of an arrow protruding from his chest.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Who, our guy?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Fuck. Get down!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You see other numerous arrows begin to suddenly pelt the area where they have been congregating. He immediately looks up in that direction. You don't quite see where they're coming from yet. He looks back to you and goes, "Gods curse them! Stay out of sight!"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I cast Cure Wounds on Kaulden.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh no, he is a ways away from you guys. He left the alcove and went up on a rock.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, shit. Can we hide?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Are we still by the hole?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys are still in the alcove right now, yes. You hear (arrow impacts) hitting rocks and smashing against them. You hear bolts and other things.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can we see where they're coming from?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a perception check if you want to go look.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Fuck.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, come on! That was so good, but it's nine.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You don't see anything at the moment, partially because you're trying to also keep out of sight. You hear it, Caduceus, at first, this familiar, growling gibbering.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Gnolls.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: More gnolls?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ah, I hate them.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At which point, those of you who are glancing around can see, beyond them, there are a number of other groups of large stones where occasionally you see, jumping up from behind, these large, humanoid, furred gnolls with longbows that are releasing volley after volley towards them. You cannot really see the rest of the Muck Men or the state that things are in right now, but they're returning fire left and right. Are you guys staying put and staying out of sight? You don't seem to have caught their attention.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, we're fucking engaging these fucking things.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We don't even know which direction they're coming from.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Or how many there are.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Can we see where they're coming from, or do we have any sense of how far away they are?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You've seen a few of them around, maybe 50 or 60 feet away, from around one section of stone.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What are Kaulden's men doing? Are they breaking to move and take off, or are they hunkering down and trying to defend?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: If you want to try to look out and make a perception check to keep an eye, you can.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Because we were alone with Kaulden in here, didn't his troops sink back in their hiding spots at all?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They did, and then he whistled to call them up from their places when you guys were about to engage for trade.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: A natural one.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Fuck.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I say we try and help.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sure. We need to get out of here.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: How far away is the rock towards where Kaulden's people are?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Let me show you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Hey!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You haven't engaged yet, but I'm going to give you a lay of the land.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm just happy that there's a map.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No matter if you're just friends, casual acquaintances at a bar, family members. It's Valentine's Day; let the love flow.

lines.name: ALL
lines.text: Whoa!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is it green or is the light green?

lines.name: MATT, TALIESIN
lines.text: The light is green.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It looks so green!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This is actually on a mountain. There is a slight incline.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Raked stage.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Woo! Oh, it is, yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys are all pressed into this alcove over here.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do I need to look up the difference between downstage and upstage?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: If we have to.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Anybody want some candy?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Here.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That was a really bad throw.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Something else.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm going to cast Invisibility on myself, and I'm going to run out there and look.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nott, you cast Invisibility, and you go out and look.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What do I see?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Suddenly, they all reach around a side of the rock and release a volley. You see both gnolls take a bunch to the chest and keep running, but begin to slow. A second volley. One of them shouts out, "Fire!" They release a secondary volley. Both of them fall and crumple to their knees. They're both killed as they rush by. However, what you do see is around the way, this one member of this team suddenly crumple to the ground, weapon clatter out of out their hand. Curling around the way, the familiar, insect-like Kryn armor of some sort of a Kryn warrior comes around the rock. It darts forward and leaps upwards and strikes downward, hitting another one of them. As it does, suddenly two copies of itself made of somewhat immaterial, shadow-like energy also apparate and strike down in rapid succession, all three strikes cleaving down into one of the other members of the group, who immediately is cut and falls to the ground.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Caleb casts Tongues as soon as he hears the foreign language out. He's got that small clay model of the ziggurat.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so you begin casting Tongues on yourself?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, one action.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Suddenly all the rocks within ten feet of it shoot to the center, being pulled out of heavy gravitational energy to the center as these figures right here are also pulled in, the rocks crushing and pelting them, this line of gravitational tug jamming them for 100 feet out this way.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Gravity and time.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah. I think it was the sewers under Zadash, right, the last time we saw—

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is that where we saw the gray energy?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: The dark orb? Remember, we kept thinking it was an orb of death?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh god, yeah, that's right. Oh my god. Are they all going to die if we don't--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Both of these figures get crushed into themselves their bodies suddenly folded into a sphere of bone and skin before they're flung to the ground, where bits of the stone and rock that were jammed into their bodies slightly come loose and tumble to the ground as the gravitational pull vanishes. One is still surviving from behind and ducks behind. You can see blood running from this brass dragonborn as this dark blood's running from the nose and the ear and under the eye. It's trying to pull another arrow. Are you guys doing anything?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm going to call back: Mighty Nein, follow my voice! I'll lead them. I'll go over near that cactus-looking thing over there.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: There's no way they don't eventually find us, right?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, they're going to find us.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah. That seems like cover over there, right? Do I see any bad guys right there?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, actually, what you see is-- so this is where Kaulden is, and this is where another one of the cloaked figures is.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Should we pop out and do something?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Bad news, everyone out!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to cast Bless, by the way, because we have a moment, on you, Yasha, and Beau.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (whispering) Oh, fuck yeah! Thank you.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm going to grab the leather thong and cast Mage Armor.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to cast Bless on-- who didn't get it? Anybody that didn't get it. Fjord?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, Fjord got it. It was Fjord, Yasha, and Beau.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, okay. Nott and Caleb and-- do I have to be able to see you? No, of my choice within range.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You don't know where I am.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's within range!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Does it say a target you can see?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, a target within range.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're getting blessed instead of who? Oh, from—

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm blessing Caduceus.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Okay, I'll take that. You're the only one without Bless.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: 1d4, right?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, 1d4 to saves and attacks.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Awesome.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There you go.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Basically everyone but me is blessed.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Everybody but you? I misunderstood.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: #EverybodyButMeIsBlessed.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's amazing. There we go.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: From our position, can we see-- I can't see on the other side of that rock-- the person up at the top. Is that friend or foe?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's Kaulden. He's currently against the rock with the arrow in his chest, going (panting).

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, I'll run out of the cave and run in his direction.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Are you doing this not to be seen or—

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Are we doing anything? Should we jump out and attack? Because we would get a surprise attack if someone jumps out and does something.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You guys don't.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: If you came out, you would see it, though.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We just hear shit.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm down for a big attack.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's up to you guys.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm just saying, if we jump out and attack, we'd get a surprise.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I would think so.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Right? Oh, they're in combat, so they wouldn't be surprised.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's not an ambush.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's a condition; it's not something that we do. I learn, after 115 episodes.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, well then, never mind. Do whatever you want.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What are you guys doing?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Attacking!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're attacking, all right. Then roll initiative if you guys are going to jump into this fight.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: These guys are really powerful, you guys.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: They look powerful.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Here we go!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: This is not going to go terribly.

lines.name: SAM, LAURA
lines.text: They're super powerful.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Stretch your legs. Here we go.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh my god.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Perfect.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: If things go poorly, head for the hole.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (singing) Head for the hole.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: This Valentine's Day.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Ouch.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So it's 19, 19?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Sorry, sound guy.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Sorry, Chris.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Guys, Critical Role, am I right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 15 to ten?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Fjord had a 14.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Jester had a 12.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: 11 for me, if we're down that far.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yasha got what?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Five.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Aww, on brand.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Where's blink dog at?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Wait, where you at, Nott?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He's still attached to my hip.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: With the other animal?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The figure then rushes towards this one, leaps off towards it, and as it strikes down towards the air with its blade, the shadow figure tends to reach out and grab its arm to hold it in place. As the figure's trying to run away with its bow in hand, it gets held there in the moment by the shadow, it looks like, as it looks up just in time for the large armored figure to come down with a greatsword. Two other shadow versions appear with similar greatswords and all come down towards it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Should we back off? We should--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's a hit, and that's a hit.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh shit.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Y'all, this might be a really bad idea.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Where are we going to go?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I don't know; they would find us! Oh god--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Both arms are cut off, and where the torso is, the greatsword jams itself down about 12 inches past the clavicle in the chest. The warrior kicks the body off of the blade and splats onto the rocky ground behind.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh man.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: The two fucking--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Should we talk to them?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (laughing) Should we talk to them! I love it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Beau, you're up next.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh no!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Have no fear.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I feel a lot of fear.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can I jump over the wall that I'm-- the whole wall?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. You'll lose about ten feet of movement to get over the top, but you can do that.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I mean, it'd be pretty much the same to run around. I'm going to do that!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We have all those archers that we need to deal with.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Wait, what?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: All those gnoll archers.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Mm-hmm.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's ten feet of movement to get up onto it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's five archers. Jesus.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you step up onto the edge, you watch the warrior after it kicks its blade off. The two shadow clones of it blink out of existence, and the helmet looks right up at you. You've definitely made yourself known. What are you doing?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (exhales) I'm going for the main motherfucker.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Over here?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. That's ten.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: How much movement do I have?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You have 35 feet still.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I can make it, right? That's 35 feet, it looks like. Jump!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's a low DC.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (counting) 30. I could do it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What a cute dress.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Thank you. (whispers) Uk'otoa. (normal voice) What was it? Acrobatics?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Calling out his name for good luck? I got you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You've just enough movement to get right adjacent to him. As you rush up, you can see within the helmet, what little bit of the metal is not covering the eyes, you can see the drow skin tone from beneath, the very angry and intense eyes staring back at you. You can see the cheeks and the eyes curl up into a smile. What do you do?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, he's smiling! This is bad!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I smile back, give him a little wink. I'm going to do an upper elbow to his jawline and then go for the ribs.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go for it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, I like the combo!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh boy.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Natural 20.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Not good. It's okay.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Bless?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: 16? Plus Bless! No. Eight-- it is an 18 now, though!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 18? It hits the helmet.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh no!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No damage. It just misses.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It just misses.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We got another one coming.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay. It just misses.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That was your first attack.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's a natural 15 plus eight, so 23.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This does hit. As you pull back the elbow, you go for the chest hit after that. It does hit armor, but you find a piece where the plates themselves meet. You push past, and you feel the impact catch him in the lower clavicle.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm going to spend a ki point to do Stunning Strike.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. The DC on that is?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It is 14.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 18, unfortunately.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh yeah.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh wait, no. Not abilities, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No. It doesn't affect the DC, unfortunately.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's nine points of damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nine points of damage.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm going to do Flurry of Blows. Another ki point.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Two more unarmed attacks. Go for it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Go down one. There we go. No. 18.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 18 just misses. You go--

lines.name: TRAVIS, LAURA, MARISHA
lines.text: Bless!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: On every attack? Is that how it is? That's amazing.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yes!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 19, that's just enough. You pull back, and Caduceus' guidance, the Wildmother's energy, propels you forward for that strike--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Hey.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He's going to use his reaction to do Shadow Martyr.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I can also-- I've hit twice now, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, this will be your second hit. It does not. The clone that was in the space that you rushed into darts in between, and you end up actually striking it in the chest instead. Roll damage on that strike. He doesn't take it, but the clone does.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Nine again.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It dissipates, but it blocks the blow for him.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: How many attacks do I need for my Extract--?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Extract Aspects? You need to hit him with one of your Flurry of Blows strikes, which you haven't yet because it hit the clone instead.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay, so one more.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You get one more attack.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Plus a d4.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: One, 13.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, that hits. 21?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Yeah, he does not have his reaction, so it definitely hits.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Six points of damage, but Extract (stumbling)--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Aspects, yes. What would you like to know?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I want to know what his constitution saving throw is.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Plus four.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Whew.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay, and then I get to know one more thing, right? Do I get to know one thing or two things?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, we adjusted it so that every time you hit, you get to learn one thing.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay. Stunning Strike on that last one again.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go for it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He rolls. Spending another ki point, though. Stunning Strike.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right, Stunning Strike. No, he's stunned.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Come on! Who's up next? Hit that motherfucker!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I hate that ability so much.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I burned three ki points, but I stunned him!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh my god, you're so clutch.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That finishes your turn, Beau? Caleb, you're up.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I cannot see anything. I'm going to move around the edge to get a look at the battlefield.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You scoot by.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Tree's with you. Let go, Groot!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I can probably see some gnoll archers from there, and the man with the staff?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I will take a pinch of phosphorous, and slap it into my hand, and squelch the other hand through it, and cast Wall of Fire, a straight line splitting the field in half.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Woo! Dope.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Where is this wall going?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Damage going this way, downstage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Across which way?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: From Caleb, a straight line, blocking Beauregard and her opponent. But it won't go that far. I'll probably start it where you put the second one, Matthew.

lines.name: MATT
