lines.text: Oh, right.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah. 60 feet, I believe.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He's going to attempt to Counterspell.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh wow! This is so sexy.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Natural 16 plus five, 21. That fire wall--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Can I counter-Counterspell?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes, you can.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: At 4th-level? No, 3rd-level.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go ahead and roll. Well, no, it's a 3rd-level, so it does cancel 3rd-level. Okay, I'll allow it.

lines.name: SAM, LAURA
lines.text: Whoa.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It started a little further from you, right?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, he's starting it from that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, from here?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Fuck you! No, fuck you!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Like this here?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah. If I have any movement left, I will--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You have, I'll say, 15 feet of movement left.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Go back where I came from.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Classic Caleb.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There you go.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You're welcome.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Nice.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That finishes your turn.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Caduceus, Fjord, Jester.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, next it's the other figure that attempted to Counterspell and failed. Angrily seeing you mid-spell Counterspell it while releasing this wall of flame that shoots up in the space--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Who was Counterspelling? This individual over here?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He's going to go ahead and--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (whispering) He's going to be able to do something to all of us.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm afraid of a Fireball or some shit.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We have cover right now, though.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What did we say about saying that out loud?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm sorry, it's like Macbeth.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Don't give the DM ideas.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: This is tense.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Matt, you look very dashing tonight. You look really handsome.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Thank you. You're sweet.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Right? Isn't his beard so nice?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It really is.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, what happened, Taliesin? Everyone had a beard but me, so I jumped in, and now yours is gone.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I had to break the chain. Otherwise, if there's too many beards, then it's free and allowed to-- the creature that's beneath the table-- (whispering) Uk'otoa. Uk'otoa needs beards to survive.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: He's got a lot of movement speed, man.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Actually, it can hang back here, I think.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh damn.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It angrily watched the fire burn up. The light scatters across the stone and base of the mountain here, the side of its armor now shining from the flickering light source. Angrily it goes and hops up to the top after watching you dart behind that area, raises its staff, focuses. In the center of the area out in front of Fjord, as you're getting ready, Fjord, all of a sudden this green, thick fume fills the area as he casts Cloudkill.

lines.name: LAURA, TRAVIS
lines.text: Cloudkill?!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What even is that? How high of a level is that?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I think that's real high.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Everybody but Beau--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh my god, are we all going to die?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Me, too?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, because it had to hit at the edge of the fire wall to try and get inside the alcove where it saw you vanish. It actually does overlap where you are. Yeah, it does. I need everyone to make a constitution saving throw.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: With a d4.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: With Bless, except for me!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Except for you. Sorry.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yasha first.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh boy, not good.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: With a d4?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, balls.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, not good.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh boy.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Excellent.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, that's not good.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: These are bad things! These are bad things to be saying out loud.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You're fine.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's really bad.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is that numbers, or is that a wave?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's numbers.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Fjord rolled a 24. Yasha rolled a 19.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You both take 16 points of poison damage.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Copy that.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: War Caster feat at advantage. Proficiency bonus, plus the Bless, I got to 16.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Wait, War Caster to--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, so not at advantage at all. But the first roll was the highest, so the same.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. You also take 16 points of poison damage.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Fail. Nine.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Take 32 points of poison damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You take 16 points of poison damage.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Seven.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You take 32 points of poison damage. The cloud remains there.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Did you say-- how many points did I take?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You took 16.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Uncanny Dodge doesn't work against area-of-effect sort of things?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's not an attack, unfortunately.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay, cool.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The cloud remains there. All of you all of a sudden feel the poisonous fume burning against your skin and the inside of your lungs, and you find yourself instinctually coughing in horrible pain. It's burning the inside of your body like an acidic rock that's expanding in your chest.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What level spell is that? Do we know?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Ass-level.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's also going to use its Gravity Well ability, which whenever it affects a creature with a spell, it can push it ten feet in a direction of its choice. You guys feel, as you're coughing, the sudden force of gravity begin to drag you out into the open.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Cool.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Ten feet for each of you.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Matt, also, do I need to make a constitution save?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You do, and everyone with Bless up has to make one, too.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, all right.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Did you roll a 20?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Good.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Do I get to use-- that's on a save, is it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's a constitution saving throw.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: So the Bless does add to the--?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I think it would.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 16? Yeah. You need to roll, for most of you guys who took 32 damage, you need to get 16 or higher.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I only took 16 damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes, you're fine.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's a constitution save?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: To maintain a spell?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You rolled a 21? Yeah, so you maintain it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: 17 plus others.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, so you maintain your Invisibility.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Natural 20, that got me up to 26.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That now brings us to Caduceus.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Do I take damage at the top of the round? With the gas, or no? That would really suck, but I thought I'd ask, because I'm an idiot.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: If you start your turn there-- Actually, this damage happens at the start of your turn, I misread that. So it didn't hit you yet. As your turns come around, you will take this damage and be pulled out.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Okay, so I just took that damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Correct.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to step out of this cloud up around that way. Is that my full movement?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You have five feet left.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to-- shit, son. I'm going to see if I can get a little-- Oh fuck, then I'm going to be in the range of the archers. I'm going to pull around the corner there and I'm going to burn my action to get-- Can I get within 30 feet of Beau's opponent, or no?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You don't know. You can try it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'll try it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You are-- it is 35 feet from you.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to cast the--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He's 35 feet.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: 35's fine. I'm going to use the Blight Staff and summon the swarm five feet away from him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Next turn, they can attack.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Correct.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's everything I can do.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, ending Caduceus' turn.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm just going to keep my cover there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nope, natural four. This one here is going to go (counting) six and is going to take two attacks, with advantage, on the stunned--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Technically, I can attack adjacent creatures, so technically, I could have taken that bite attack.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, then go for it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'll add that to the--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That hits.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Where is that attack?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So that's four damage it takes.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's a melee attack.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Second attack is a natural 20. That's a crit.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Natural 20, by the way, to hit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's 11 points of damage from that one.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We need all the help we can get. We need

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You see the dragonborn, bleeding, cloak pulled over one shoulder, come by and, with its longsword, hack twice into the entity and give you a look of, "Let's do this."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Hit is ten 4d4 piercing damage, so is that ten plus 4d4, if I recall, or is it just 4d4?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, it's just 4d4.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Why does it have that ten there? That's weird.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The plus ten is to hit, I think. Wait, sorry, what you're seeing is the ten? Ten is the average damage. I misheard you.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's (counting) 22 points of damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 22 points of damage, ooh! Nice.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Sam is reminding me that I need to roll constitution saves--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: For keeping Bless?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, I did that already. For Nugget and Sprinkle. I feel like Sprinkle is--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I just hate animals so much.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Apparently.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I feel like Sprinkle is in my clothes, so he's got a filter.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'll say for the purposes of fun-- (laughter) I'm not going to immediately murder her weasel because of one errant spell.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, you piece of shit.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Roll a constitution saving throw for Nugget.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nice. For the hell of it--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Terrible.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Mark down that Nugget has eight hit points left.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes. I have the thing, yeah. He took 16 points. He technically has six hit points left, according to the thing that Sam gave me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That finishes them. Kaulden's going to turn and pull out his shortbow and take a shot at that gnoll over there. Fucking five, misses. Hits on the second one.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Come on, Calder!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (whimpering and growling)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, Colder, Calder?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Kaulden. He's going to step back and go this way, staying out of the cloud area. This guy's going to move out from underneath the cloud, coughing. Actually, at the start of his turn, he takes-- he does not make his save. He dies.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: He dies?!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He's coughing, vomits onto the ground, and then collapses. You see the skin on the face begin to bubble and boil from this strangely poisonous cloud.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Kaulden's losing all his people.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, he only has four left, aside from him.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: They seemed so badass.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: They did! I thought they were going to kill us.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: They just had nice cloaks. We made some assumptions because you're like, oh, those cloaks are great.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (cooing noises)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Is that the secret?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Obviously not!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Fashion doth make the man.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: After their turn, it is now Fjord's turn.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yes. I will dart out of the green cloud--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You take your damage at the top of the turn, which you already did.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Uh-huh. I will move 30 feet towards Kaulden's direction. Not up on the platform with him though.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He's not up on the platform; he ducked down below. You're actually right up next to--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Is that only as far as 30 feet carries me?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's (counting) 20. You have ten more feet if you want to go.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I will go-- can I get behind that spire or that little upcropping?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. You can get over there.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Perfect. I will use my action to point up towards the sky; my eyes will roll back, and I will summon the barlgura. And I will drop--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, shit!

lines.name: MARISHA, TALIESIN
lines.text: Yes!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Thank god!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: 60 feet. As far as I can get it in the direction of all these jackasses over here.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 60 feet? Right there.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Just down the line, man.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'll tell him to kill everything, but get me the caster.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He's not going to kill us, is he?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Does the barlgura take its turn when you summon it?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: He rolls initiative.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right, so roll for him.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Roll low so that he gets to go.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Well, it's 15. He should've rolled shittier.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He's right before you guys next round.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, right before me. Damn it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That finish your turn?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Unless you have a B.A.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: B.A.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, that's it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Jester, you're up.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, okay, okay. I'm going to look at how this works, and probably-- I mean, I can try this.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah. Try whatever.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I don't know how long that lasts. Okay, I'm going to (squeal). Okay, I'm going to run out from under the cloud. Can I climb up and over and hop down right here?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Five, 10 15.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I want to hop down behind that rock, on the other side.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (counting) That's your movement, getting you there. You can jump down this way, or you can jump down-- you can't quite get far enough to jump over that way.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I guess I'll jump down on that side.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Can we see in the cloud, by the way?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I would say you can barely make out shapes and stuff. I'll say half cover while inside. You can still see shapes and things at a certain distance.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm out of the cloud?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're out of the cloud, yes.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Then for my bonus action, I'm going to-- I guess I can't cast another thing. I'm going to--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Do you have a bonus action heal that you can hit?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I don't think so. Mm-mm, because I already-- hmm.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Healing Word's a B.A. Why am I saying B.A. all the time?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I don't know.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, fuck!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I don't have Healing Word. I'm going to crouch down.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Natural 20, the first one against it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I think it hits.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And an eight. That's 17 points of damage from one gnoll's spear. The other one against it, natural two.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That misses.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The other one, the barlgura grabs the spear and is now wrestling for it. (growling) Spittle coming out of it. The gnolls are taken aback by it. They still feel their power in numbers, so they're not quite certain of the danger they're in.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We'll work on that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This guy moves up a bit and comes to this point. He's going to fire a longbow at you, Travis.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Fjord or the barlgura? Or Yasha?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Fjord. No, at Travis, at you. That is a 25 to hit, actually.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That hits.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That is nine points of piercing damage as the longbow arrow sinks into your chest. Make a constitution saving throw for me, to try and maintain--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You get to add a d4 to that.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay, great.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Hashtag blessed.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, you're fine. You maintain that. This one's going to move forward.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's a gnoll? A regular gnoll?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Natural 20 again!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Jesus.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Happy Valentine's Day!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Archers. Oh, I get it now.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The arrow sinks in. It doesn't kill that ranger, but that ranger is now looking around and seeing a lot of his friends dead and is starting to gauge if it's worth staying. That finishes that gnoll there. This one here, let's see if it's going to mess with the barlgura. Yeah, it's going to rush up and join its friends, to try and group up on the barlgura. That is a 15 to hit. What's its armor class?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's 15.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Using both hands, it jams the spear into its abdomen.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Wow, they're really going on him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That ends the gnolls' go. That brings us to Nott.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: If I run out of the cloud, do I take more damage, or is that--?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, at the top of the turn is when you take the damage. I'm retroactively considering that. If you stay in the cloud--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm going to run out of the cloud. I think I'll go downstage, so I'll run towards this mess over here. Can I get as far as this, or no?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 15, 20, 25, 30 is where you can get.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: 35 feet of movement.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, right there.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Fjord's dead.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Bye, Fjord. Sorry, bud. That's as far as you can get there.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, then, I will... balls. (singing) Balls, balls, balls.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You've got a gnoll there.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We do have lots of gnolls that I don't want to waste my effort on. I will bonus action get behind that tree stump thing there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so you're going to dash behind it?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I will hold a crossbow bolt.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yasha's up.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yasha would like to ragé.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She has effectively ragéd.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay, and she will make her way towards Beau, 40 feet.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (counting) 40.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yep. Does the Kryn have any illusions or duplicates or copies up or anything?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Currently, no.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Nothing? Then she's going to throw the Magician's Judge at the Kryn.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay. Is that a thing?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's an improvised weapon, technically, because you're throwing it. Roll an attack roll.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Plus a d4.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay. She will make it reckless. Sorry, again, I'm rolling a what plus a what?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're rolling 2d20 plus 1d4.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay, so 19 plus 1d4. Natural 19 plus two, 21.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 21 plus her strength modifier.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Which is (stammering) three.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You hit. You're fine. Roll a d4 plus her strength, plus rage bonus. It's not full sword damage; she's just (whooshing).

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Sorry, again, d4 plus--?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Plus strength, plus rage damage.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (counting) Nine points.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nine points of damage. While the Kryn's shaking its head trying to right itself, the Magician's Judge (whooshing, then impact), scrapes off the armor and carves in for a minute. It sticks for a second before it falls out, leaving this open wound where some of the armor's opening against the plates. That ends Yasha's go?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I believe so. The Divine Fury, would that apply to that weapon attack? When you're raging, the first creature you hit on one of your turns with a weapon attack. 1d6 plus three.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, I'll allow it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay, 1d6 plus three. Six plus three, so nine radiant damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's stunned; can't do anything.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (chuckling maniacally)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Beau, your go.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (grunts) Same thing, up under that helmet!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Do you have advantage because he's stunned?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Fuck you and your helmet. Yes, I do.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Fuck you and your helmet.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Your d4.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (laughter) The power! Fuck. Wait! No.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You're kidding. Which ones? These two?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No, I rolled an eight and a three, and then I rolled a one with my-- no. It's 17.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You get excited and punch right square into the chest part of the armor. You feel your knuckles (cracking), and it stings, and it didn't quite get through.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Thanks for the wraps. I'm going to knee him in the balls.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go for it. Roll for a second attack.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That feels right.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Happy Valentine's Day.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Son of a fuck bitch!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You have advantage still. He's still stunned.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I did! A three and a four!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, shit.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Plus the d4, even? Yeah, that doesn't matter.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You go for the balls. You've learned a little bit about the Kryn Dynasty's main armored warriors: they wear a metal cup.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Carapace codpiece.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (metallic clang) "Ugh!"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's smart.

lines.name: SAM, TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, you've got to protect that.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Flurry of Blows.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, two more strikes.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Two more strikes.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Woman wants a hit.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I can't believe-- he's fucking stunned! Yes! Yes. This one does. Plus four--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: 14, with your modifier.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: 18 plus four: 22.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 22 hits!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That was the first one. Okay. Ten damage, Stunning Strike.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Stunning Strike again.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Again. I am burning all my ki points.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 13 plus four.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is that good? Is that bad?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He resists it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He resisted?!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He resisted. One more time!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Two threes.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: What are you rolling? Do you need to borrow dice?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, get rid of those dice, maybe? Don't use them?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Maybe it doesn't matter because that's just superstition?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It matters!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'm so sorry.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Got to clean your palate.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Running low on ki points.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: However, you did hit, so you get to learn something else about him, if you want to.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I did hit. I hit the one time. Does anyone have any spells that you do?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, find out what his wisdom is.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: His wisdom. What is his wisdom saving throw?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Plus one.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Plus one? His constitution was plus four.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Aha! That's what it was.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: His wisdom is plus one. So he's not very wise!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Beau, are you staying where you are? Are you going to move anywhere, or are you going to stay put?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'll stay. Well, he's about to be unstunned.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He is.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm going to back up in between Yasha and Caduceus, upstage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Upstage. Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Caleb, you're up.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm going to run out of this cloud directly downstage, which I think will put us next to our new friend?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right there?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Ja

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: But you saw him pop down.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Roll damage for that.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (singing) Barlgura has fire resistance.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Still make its saving throw.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Balrog's not in it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He's just outside of it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sure, I'll allow it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: If he's in it, he's in it. I thought he was in it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There is a way that you can-- Roll a standard intelligence check for me.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay. I mean--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's not a huge deal.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That is-- straight intelligence you said, right? 15.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, you're fine. Keep the barlgura, no worries. Damage on that was--?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: For the gnolls here, dex save. 15, what's the spell DC?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: For Fireball?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: For any of your spells.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, that's a fail.

lines.name: TALIESIN, SAM
lines.text: Yes!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Fail. Fail.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All those gnolls just (yelp) and are immediately burned to a crisp and fall back, smoking. For the Kryn mage there, natural 19--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Dick.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So he only takes half the damage of that.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Bless you, Caleb, you sweet son of a bitch.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (southern accent) I hope he's a glass cannon as well. Maybe he's also really low on health.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. That ends your go?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm out.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You got it. He's going to make a concentration check-- that's cocked. And fails; the Cloudkill vanishes.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Fucking amazing.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Now that we're all out of it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yep (laughs).

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I mean, yeah.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: He flushed us out.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It is now that figure's turn. Couple of fun things:

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Couple of fun things!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I hate that phrase.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: This is not a lair, Matthew.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Unless we're saying it, it's not a good phrase! Anybody want some chocolate?!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: From behind this area here a shadow version of that same mage comes out of hiding, and they both, in the same turn, moves forward to here.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Comes

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, the whole time?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Mm-hmm.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Fire.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Didn't go on the last turn.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's like they have a best friend with them all the time, they're like--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: The mage took damage on the Firebolt that Caleb did though, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Correct.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I am firing at him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You are.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (whispering) Fuck.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Plus four!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah I got it. Not great. Oh, well, 18.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 18 hits.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay, good.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: But you are no longer invisible either.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's right. Ah!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ah!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Ah! Fury of the Small.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's my secret: I'm always small.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, 22.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Points of damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nice. Okay, actually, this guy-- no, he's going to stay there.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You were firing at the shadow, or the guy?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The real one.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Real guy.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Guy on the hill.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Correct.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Real Slim Shady.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. Great. So you finish that strike, this one moves out of the way here, and he's going to cast Compress Gravity at 3rd-level.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: The little shadow guy can cast spells?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He can cast one spell.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What is it, Reverse Gravity?

lines.name: MATT, LAURA
lines.text: Compress Gravity.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What is that?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's what we just saw.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I need Caleb and Fjord to both make a constitution saving throw, please.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You can do it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Plus the d4.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Plus the Bless, thank you.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Ooh, do well.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. You guys are rolling good on those saving throws, jesus.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Constitution saving throw, right?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What'd you roll?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you each take 14 points of force damage and you make your respective saving throws, your constitution saving throws. Your speed is halved until its next turn. You find gravity-- you're all of a sudden yanked to the ground and your head goes numb for a second from the shifting of the space and the weight of your body, and then you find yourself pulled down for the next round.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: 16? So that's--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, you're fine.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Plus the Bless, 26.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, you're fine.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: War Caster.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, me too.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And it vanishes.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, 28 points of damage, not 22.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, got you. Good to know.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: How are you-- Everyone--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, yeah, yeah.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: If you are going down, you aren't going to be down for long.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You're pretty far away from them.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: So I've got 120 feet worth of healing.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He's going to cast Vacuum Blast in the same area.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Jeepers creepers, y'all.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Which is a 20-foot radius.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Who did that? Same guy?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The guy up top.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Is Vacuum Blast the same as Compress Gravity?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nope.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: His shadow cast a spell, and now he gets to cast a spell.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So I need you guys also to make a constitution saving throw, please.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Plus a d4.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Thank you. Natural 20!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: 22. Oh, 27, sorry.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Are you making-- Is it a concentration-- no, the Wall of Fire's just there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The Wall of Fire he's making--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So both of you guys take half damage.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Fuck. He's rocking us.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, these are really powerful guys.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Caleb's fucked up.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I don't know what these spells are.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And make another constitution saving throw.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh my god.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Are you alive?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Sure.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Plus a d4.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That Vacuum Blast sucked.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Fuck you, Dyson.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 14. That's okay, because it's half the damage you took. So you're fine.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (counting) 28.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, you're fine. You guys are rolling really fucking high tonight.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Stacks up.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I definitely missed almost every punch, with advantage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I know. So send some of your luck her way.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I was like "protect the melee fighter" and now I'm getting fucked up.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And Kaulden is gone.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What do you mean? He's dead?!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You watch as Kaulden gets pulled back-- the Vacuum Blast pulls you all--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What? He had piercing, blue-gray eyes!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: -- and because you guys made your saves, so you are not pulled. But Kaulden gets pulled 20 feet this way. The gravity shift is like this giant vacuum hole, opens up on this side and yanks him that direction. His body get pulled into this dark space for a second and then shredded in the middle of the air, and arms, legs, pieces start falling and scattering on the ground.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Does it stay open or does it close after?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It closes. It's going to step back here for partial cover. All right, that's going to end its turn.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is its ghost-image guy gone?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Gone. It seemed to disappear when it finished casting the spell. That brings us to Caduceus.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Ooh. I'm going to-- Oh boy.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You still have the beetles, right?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I have a button for that.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What a mess we're in.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: The beetles are going to take another attack, for my bonus action. Actually, how are you guys right now? No?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Real bad.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can't see them, actually. You have no idea.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's fine. The beetles are going to be my bonus action.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Ears, eyes, nose.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, and I add a d4 to that, not that it matters. (counting) 23 to hit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: A 23 hits.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: They don't have advantage, do they?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No. He's no longer stunned.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's (counting) Eh, fuck that one. I didn't need it anyway. Sorry I'm shaking so much; I'm really nervous. (counting) Nine points of damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What's it?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Nine points of bite damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nine points of damage, you got it. The beetles are crawling into the armor plates and biting the inside. It's trying to knock it away.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: A little closer. There.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There's a person there.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, who is that? I didn't see that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's one of the remaining rangers that still survives.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, well I'm going to wave. I should be about 30 feet from that creature that we're fighting, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: About there you're 30 feet--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to hold my action until Yasha's attack, and I'm going to hold my domain, my-- where's my brain? Channel Divinity.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Caduceus, that finishes your go?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, I'm holding my--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What was your initiative, Caduceus?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's the barlgura's turn now.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, it is?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay, great--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Path of the Grave.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's what you're holding?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay, the ball-- barl-- the big demon monkey, is going to use Running Leap, which is part of his movement. He can run 40 feet and jump 20 in the same movement. And he's going to break melee with the gnoll and head towards the caster.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah. Get it, Donkey Kong!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: He's going to jump up using that 20 feet--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Here?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, so he gets within melee of that shit-ass.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Natural 17, so that's 20--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That'll hit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It takes eight points of piercing damage.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That is one bite attack and two fists, so we'll do the bite first.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Plus seven, that's a 20 to hit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 20 to hit? Casts Shield as a reaction, so that misses.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay it misses, so the second one is a fist. That is a 22 to hit.

lines.text: Ten points of fire damage. Off the side of his shoulder, pats it out.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And I'm going to use my movement, which is halved because the gravitational effect, I think, to go over behind that tall outcropping of rock upstage. I'm going to-- no, right up against the one that's-- no, behind this; hiding from the magic user. And for my bonus action, I'm just going to pull out a healing potion, and not drink it and just hold it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. You got it. That finishes your turn, Caleb?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Ja

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. It's now the mage's turn. The mage is going to take an attack of opportunity from the barlgura. So go ahead and roll for a strike.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (singsong) Pull that back up! Bite attack: that's a 13.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 13 misses. Wide swing, just as the mage ducks down beneath. (counting)

lines.name: SAM, LAURA
lines.text: Oh no!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Reaches over and grabs him and you watch as they both vanish. Dimension Dooring out of sight.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I can't do anything with them? Does that provoke an attack of opportunity?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nope. It's a Teleport. The flames flicker, and you angrily stomp around the space where it was. You glance about. Make a perception check.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They're out of sight. The flames still burning from the fire wall, and you look about and can see the various scattered dead bodies of the various rangers who you had just met. And that's where we're going to take our break.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That was a satisfying fight?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Lot of cool shit happened.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: A lot of cool shit happened.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We're not technically out of initiative yet.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: There's a gnoll!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I know. We're going to come back at that here in a second.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Jester is almost dead.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Jester's fine. I got that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, how many hit points does the barlgura have?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'll say for the purposes, because otherwise we'll be running through the motions here. The gnoll's not going to last very long, and barlgura either, with all of you guys focused on it. You quickly dispatch the barlgura and the gnoll, take a moment to breathe--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You're at 30 hit points.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm at 30 hit points. I'm not dead.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There you go. And then we're going to take a break.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Tonight, as our Wyrmwood giveaway, we have this delightful cherrywood dice box from our friends here, leather interior, to give away. To possibly win this, head on over to the Twitch chat on the Critical Role Twitch stream, that's twitch.tv/criticalrole. Enter the keyword "date"! D-A-T-E, because it's Valentine's Day, and you're having a date with us. But enter it once, only once. Once again, only the US and Canada, excluding Quebec, because of stupid laws. But we'll have a winner for you when you come back in just a little bit! See you in a sec.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Nice.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And welcome back, everyone. Before we get into it, we'll have Laura and Travis joining us in just a second. They're dealing with mommy/daddy stuff.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (loudly) They are fucking!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Just a quickie.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We do have a winner for our giveaway, which is procrastinate_or. Procrastinate underscore O-R, congratulations. You won tonight, we'll have that sent to you ASAP. Well done. So, bringing us back in: there, standing amongst the base of the Ashkeeper Peaks, overlooking the wastes of Xhorhas before you and the path you've chosen to take, you can see the various slaughtered gnolls scattered amongst the nearby rock and stone, as well as the bodies of the individuals you had even just previously met-- this scouting regiment out of Bladegarden. Only three survivors remain, and they, not even acknowledging your presence, start gathering the corpses of their friends and laying them side by side, checking them for any goods that they won't be needing.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I don't say anything, but I just slowly start helping them.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (trickling liquid)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Full bladder?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sorry. Did you ever heal Jester?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, I healed Jester. I'm taking care of Jester for this.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: How many of them are left?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There are three.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Three.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Three survivors of what was originally 11.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Three of 11, wow.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Anything on any of the gnolls' bodies?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can make an investigation check.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 22, all right. Amongst the gnolls, you manage to pull together what comes to about 26 gold pieces, 16 silver pieces, and 31 copper.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Aw, man. Imagine what kind of loot we would have gotten off the other guys.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I know. There are only three of the Muck Men left.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Did we loot them?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughing) They're alive.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There are three living Muck Men that are currently--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: They are gathering their dead brethren.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Caduceus has brought you from the brink of death.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Mm-hmm. You're feeling okay, though.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I feel pretty good, minus the fact that I almost died.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm going to start limping over to the closest Muck Man.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You walk over and you see a stern-faced woman with ratty, brown, mousy hair that is pulled into a tight braid that disappears into the back of the hood. The hood is currently slipped back, she looks-- blood pooling down one side of the forehead that has now begun to dry and mingle with the sweat. She doesn't pay any attention as you approach and is in the process of folding arms over and checking pockets.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Smear away the blood coming out of my eyes and nose from that gravitational bullshit and will crouch down next to her and attempt to help in any way I can, and ask: How-- hoo, my head-- frequent a thing is this?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "This is not very frequent. We usually do not have to reveal ourselves for others. It was "careless of Kaulden. But a lesson he paid for."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: How far off are you from the nearest group of your brethren?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "As far as I know, there are maybe three other scouting regiments out amongst the "Ashkeepers, but we all keep to ourselves. We are to return to Bladegarden within the week. Looks "like we'll do our best to bring back what we can, effects for the families. Unfortunately, we're not "enough to carry the bodies back."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do we need to bury them or burn them or--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What do you want to do with them?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can see her eyes flitter amongst the corpses and go, "I'm not superstitious, but I do "know of the whispers of various necromantic terrors to the far east. I say probably best we "burn them." She continues to rummage through and pulls out some coin, pulls out some arrows. Takes off a section of the armor and inspects it; it's too damaged. Sets it back down.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: To the east. If we head east, we are going to have problems with the undead?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I don't know. I have not been that far east."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: But you hear this.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I've heard that there are-- and this is old history of Xhorhas. There were betrayers that were "dabbling with various means of creating more powerful armies. I've seen many different "shadow-based creatures that wander the waste, but I have not crossed undead myself. As I've said, I "am not superstitious, but better safe than sorry."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay, thank you. Excuse me. Caleb lies flat on his back and stares at the sky and starts into Arcane Recovery.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You said you're heading straight back to Bladegarden?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "We're not going to do much good with a small party like this."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Are there more of you back at base camp? Are you going to switch out the party?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "We cannot stop until there is some end to this insanity."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm sorry.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Did your fallen friends have any horses or carts or any way of traveling?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "If you're heading east, it's the safest for you as well. It's very hard to stay out of sight when "you're on horseback or carrying a cart."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do those cloaks keep you hidden very well? They blend in with the environment.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "This is the intended color."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do you have any extras you would be willing to part with?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She opens her hands amongst the various bodies on the ground.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I think we should take them.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, I agree.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Of course.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There's enough for all of you, though a few of them are bloodstained.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I can cast Mending on them. Try to clean them up a little bit, heal them.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Mending fixes; it doesn't clean.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Cool.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: They're going to get bloodstained eventually.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's a Prestidigitation thing. (slurring) Prestidigitation.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: If you'd like, we can build a pyre and wait till you've had some time to move on before we set it. We'll set it when it's time for us to leave, if that helps.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I appreciate that.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: 'Course.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Give us a few more minutes.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Take your time. Talk to me before you leave.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "All right." The three of them gather whatever things seem to be important. They throw the bodies on a pile, quietly bow their heads for a moment of silence, and then turn back around, throwing their cloaks over their shoulders, their hoods up, bows at the side. The woman approaches you.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: In that time, I've scribbled a note to Dairon. If you're heading anywhere, if you happen to run into a soldier by the name of Dairon with the Cobalt Soul, could you give this to her?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I'll do my best."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: She was injured. Pretty sure here in Ashgarden or Ashgrove--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Bladegarden.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That place.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Ashley Johnson.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Garden garden.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: The garden of earthly gardens.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Last I heard, she was recovering in Bladegarden.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Well, I'll ask around."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Thank you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I hate to ask this, but since you guys are heading back, would you have any supplies that would help us on our way out? Kaulden was going to give us something, I think. It's a terrible ask, I know.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Well, we only need enough food for the three of us to get back. Any sort of rations you "would need for your journey, they're in that pile there." There's a small cluster of satchels that were taken from the bodies that look to contain trail rations and other bits of edible materials for the journey.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Cool, cool. I'll take one just to have.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, make an investigation check.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ten! (grumbling)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You find some food.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Balls.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Good job.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Thanks.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The three of them gather, give you a nod, stoic, emotionless. They've probably seen some shit, and this is not an occurrence that is new to them. They turn around and begin hiking their way back up the side of the mountain.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, this place is not great, but we knew that coming in. We survived our first encounter with baddies here, so we should look on the bright side.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What if the whole city is filled with people that are as strong as they were?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I think if that were true, the war would be over by now.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's true. That's true!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I think that probably they're mostly people. We came across a couple very serious people, and we're all standing.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (whispers) I don't like serious people.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Mm-mm.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: If you'll give me a minute to help put this pyre together, I can also give everybody a little bit-- help heal a little bit.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How about you focus on that, and we'll get the bodies together?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to cast Prayer of Healing (counting) on everybody but me.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Are we taking a short rest?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We can do that, too.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'd be most appreciative.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'll do both. I'm going to cast Prayer of Healing, and we'll take a short rest.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There you go.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm going to lay down for a minute, get my ki points back.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's 2d8 plus five. Everybody gains 13 hit points.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Thank you, Caduceus.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Take a little bit of the edge off before you go into a short rest.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Short resting.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you take the time to gather your wits about you, to tend to your wounds, to have Caduceus help you recover a bit from the strain and pain of the battle that transpired, you complete your short rest. The sky is still relatively dark and cloudy. The smell in the air lets you know that rain is probable before nightfall. In the moment, you're thankful that these heavier, thicker gray cloaks might help you not soak to the entire bone. What would you like to do?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, since we're in Xhorhas, maybe one of us should take a cue from these guys and look at the dodeca-fucking-hedron. Right? Moving forward? Or should we wait until we need it?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, we can use it once a day, so one of us should look at it regardless.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: 24 hours, right?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I might've missed something. Why are we looking at it once a day?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: So that someone has the edge.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Are we not afraid that that is a beacon to us?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, we can keep it in the bag and look at it in there. We don't have to take it out or anything.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You want to take a look?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't know if I'll need it, but sure.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's your husband.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's true. I will trip balls and look at it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah! (warping sounds)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You take your fragment of possibility.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (singing) It's a star man!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Placing it back into your satchel.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Stays in the bag the whole time. We don't take it out.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Stick your face in the other dimension.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, basically.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do we just walk on, then?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I say we head east. That's the way that they said.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is there any cover out there in the fields and plains below us?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There are low batches of scrub brush here and there. There are areas where sometimes clusters of rocks and natural boulders that had either rolled down the mountains or were jettisoned by long-dormant vulcan activity-- volcanic activity can be seen. Yeah. Not doing that crossover. No. There are occasional things that you could camp against, but it is an open, badland plains. They say "the wastes of Xhorhas" because it is an open valley of gray and brown and dust and muck, occasional dotted trees that are the hardier types that survive, but aren't vibrant and pretty. They exist.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Sorry, if any of you take a minute, can you figure out which way this worm traveled?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, I guess we can look around and see.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'll look for tracks. Investigation?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'll go in on that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It'll be a survival check to look for tracks.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Best way through?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: 25. Natural 20.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ooh, 21.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. We'll say you guys manage to find where the slithered aspects of the worm push. It is definitively going east. It makes its way beyond the rocks and heads into the fields. We'll say for the remainder of the day you could follow the tracks. You'll have to make an additional attempt, each day of travel, to try and keep an eye on it, but you have an idea of where it went.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I feel like we should put these cloaks to good use and try to be careful. It will slow us, but...

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Move cautiously? I agree.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Move cautiously. Follow the path of this worm as long as possible because they are from here; they know this place. Presumably they know the path of least resistance. There will still be resistance, but at least-- let's go.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I think as long as it still follows that track that the Muck Men--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You're sure you want to save him, yeah?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: But I'll tell you if that changes.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, let me know.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: When we're ready to go, I'm going to use the tinder box to start the pyre, but not until we're ready to go. I'm not going to wait for it to fully catch because it's going to call attention.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you guys gather the rest of your supplies, pick yourselves up, apply the cloaks of those that fell in combat--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'll cast Pass Without a Trace on us as we move.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I was just going to ask.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Are you guys moving at a stealthed pace or trying to be stealthy at a standard pace?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I feel, on the mountainside at least, we should go stealthily.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: At least today. Tomorrow we may move quickly.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Half speed?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's 18 miles per day of travel at a slow pace. You don't cover as much ground.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Let's do it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: For now, yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's really slow, you guys.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can all make stealth checks.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (high, silly voice) Add ten!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Nice job, Yasha. 31 for Yasha. 21 for Fjord.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Caleb, you're blessed.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Doesn't matter.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh. No, you're blessed. You get advantage, that's what I said. I gave you the Blessing of the Trickster.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, I thought it was plus stuff. That's better. That is 11.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's plus ten, really?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No, I rolled--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Pass without a trace.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, 21. Thank you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Some of it is bristled with thorns. It is a very unwelcoming landscape. There are areas where you can see bits of the ground seem to be blasted with glass. You would recognize this as the remnants of lightning strikes that have hit the ground or other objects in the vicinity. Powerful lightning strikes.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's scary.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: If storms hit, we may need to take cover.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Just as it begins to rain gently.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Hey, it sounds like rain.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's cold rain. Make a nature check for me.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Five.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Five. It's raining.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: My nature's really low.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I know.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Aren't you a nature guy?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I spent most of my time in one place. I don't really--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There's a difference between loving nature and being able to empathize with nature, and having the specific knowledge to ascertain patterns.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's raining.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: How cold is it here, or not, out of curiosity?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Eventually the sun begins to set. It begins to grow dark. Yasha points out across the way, you can see another one of those large beasts that you had seen. At this distance, it's about maybe three quarters of a mile off.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: How big?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make an intelligence check.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: A straight intelligence? 14.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Gauging the distance from here and the way that it's interacting with the scenery around it, you watch as it reaches over and puts it hand up against a tree. You have a better view of it now, even through the rain, and you can see it has four arms. It walks like a gorilla, looks to be furred, with these squat little legs, and it makes its way across the landscape slowly. It reaches out and grabs a tree, one of those dried trees, and bends and snaps it as it moves past. Grabs it and begins scratching its shoulder with it. You guess it's probably somewhere in the neighborhood of 20 feet to the shoulder.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Bipedal, four arms?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can see its outline and the basic shape of its body.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I think he's probably nice.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Do we want to bed down now and start up early?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sure.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No objection.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I think any time traveling during the sun is probably best. I don't know if we want to risk traveling at night right now.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We'll have a little bubble then. It protects us from everything, right, Caleb?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Mm-hmm.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Probably as dark as you can make it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I can make it dark as pitch. Okay. I'm going to do the nighttime routine. I'm going to cast the dome. I'm going to use my silver thread to put an Alarm around it, and I'm going to ask Frumpkin to sit about 80 feet, 70 feet away from the dome in the direction of that hulking creature and keep extra watch, in addition to any watch we do.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: While he's doing that, I'm going to cast Glyph of Warding--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Really?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Mm-hm. And I'm going to cast it with Hold Person prepared in it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, fair enough. Where are you placing it?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Next to our bubble.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, you got it. That lasts for how long?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It takes an hour, but I think it-- let's see.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Duration: until dispelled or triggered.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I would recommend letting the rest of the party know where the glyph is placed.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes, yes. The glyph's right there. I think it only activates under--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Worst breakfast wake-up ever.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: According to physical characteristics, creature kind. I can say specifically if it's--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: A type of creature.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, like a Kryn or something like that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You got it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: "Krin?" "Kreen?"

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Kreen."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Crick.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Terrible.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Terrible. I can cast-- I can cast Sending.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Any light-based magic that you have, too. We should probably set up for tomorrow.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'll take first watch, too, because I don't think everybody passing out is a good idea no more.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I agree.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you guys bed down amongst this darkened dome for the evening, make a perception check for me.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Natural 20. 21.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Whoa doggy.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Before passing out I take one of those rags that I keep, and I put it over the driftglobe, and say: Tawaj. Leave it floating in the middle of the globe so you have some dim light.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. That does not protrude beyond the dome, correct?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Because it's opaque from the outside, yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Cool, so you have a little night light.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I use Thaumaturgy to make it sound like nice pleasant sounds of a running stream, so it sounds like we're in a peaceful place. Birds, crickets chirping.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's a little spa day.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: The dome does not hold in sound, FYI.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, it doesn't?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Beau, can I borrow your goggles?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, never mind. I don't do that.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can you borrow my what?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Your goggles.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, yes.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Thank you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What did you roll, Fjord?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Natural 20. 21 total. That big-ass perception bonus.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. As you guys rest for the evening, Fjord, you do keep an eye out. It's hard to see much beyond a certain radius because when it's night here, it's night. The clouds are thick enough, and it rains throughout the night. You do not see the moon, either of them. No light. You do not see any movement. It feels strangely reminiscent of some of the dreams you've had where you found yourself in the middle of darkness. That cold, looming, creeping thought in the back of your head of how far away you are from your promised goal to a specific entity.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Eventually you can find yourself to rest. Who would like to take second watch? Caduceus, roll perception.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: 27. Natural 19. With the goggles, just for fun.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: With the goggles? Same scenario. You can see pretty well within a short radius, but the rest of it is this beautiful, pitch-black nothing.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, that's nice.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: [music cuts off]

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That was creepy.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Whoa, that was weird.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That was my iPad getting a notification.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Any new creatures or intrusions in our immediate space with the coming light?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Did the glyph fire or anything?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The glyph did not fire off.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Is your cat still alive?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Ja

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The bad news is you're out in the middle of an open field. The good news is... you're out in the middle of an open field.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You can see it coming.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. For the most part, it's going to be hard for things to surprise you if you're being slow and stealthy. For the most part. With the day ahead of you, who's keeping watch?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm keeping an eye out.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so you're keeping an eye out? Both of you?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'll help him! Oh, never mind. You can help him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, you guys rolling individually?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'll take advantage on this.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Now that we are on the open plains, should we move at the slightly quicker pace, but still stealthy?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: At a medium pace?

lines.name: MATT, MARISHA, TALIESIN
lines.text: (singing) At a medium pace.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's awful. That's an 11.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Good to know.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Those were two terrible rolls.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Somebody should have looked at our mote while we were still in the thingy.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Someone take a look. I looked at it yesterday.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We're out in the middle of a field; let's give it to Ducey.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You take your mote of possibility.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm fighting a very miffed and wet cat who's been out all night and is crawling up inside of my cloak and hood and doing the scarf thing. It's wet on my neck, but okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You all bundle up your cloaks a little heavier and trudge forward. You are going at a normal pace, so everyone make a stealth check again.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Are we doing a plus ten?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Are you still casting Pass Without a Trace on this?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, sure. Let's do it. Sorry, I'm healing my blink dog.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Natural 20 for Fjord, 31, and 27 for Yasha.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (sighs) There it is.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: 23. 22, sorry.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Pushing on for this secondary day, you begin to see, eventually, a river on the horizon, heading from south to north. Yasha--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: This is the river that we have to cross!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yasha points out and says, "This is known as the Ifolon River."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The Hifolon?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Ifolon. "Stems from the Sorrow Weep waters, the lake to the south." Sorrow

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's the lake.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh shit.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We're at the edge of the map.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Edge of the map!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh boy, this is scary, guys. If only we had a fucking horse.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Is that Ifolon with an I?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: With an I. I-F-O-L-O-N.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I fell on the river and all I got was this lousy t-shirt.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No matter what name.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: How's the water smell? Does it smell putrid?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You are too far away from it. It's just on the horizon. You could get to it probably at your current pace by the end of the day. If you were moving slower, you wouldn't get there yet, because you are going a normal pace. And you rolled--?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right, okay. You move on for the first half of the day, keeping quiet, muttering to each other for your own sanity, discussing what may be awaiting you further and further east in this landscape still heavily marred by the wars of the gods before the Divergence. There's a moment where you're all moving forward and you hear gravelly voices, muffled and soft, a little ways out that way. The rest of you pick up on it. Actually, it would be Jester and Beauregard pick up on it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (whispering) Oh, did you hear that?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (whispering) Was that you?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, there's people or something.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's not your Thaumaturgy thing?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Fuck.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Everybody drop down.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What do you mean drop down, like flat?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We hear voices!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You hear one go (speaking guttural language).

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I cast Tongues.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Another voice begins to yell. You cast Tongues on yourself? All right. You hear it transition from guttural barks in a goblinoid language into a-- and actually, let me double check one thing here.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I speak Goblin. And Halfling, for some reason.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, you would understand it, actually.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What do they say?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The voice you hear says, "Quick, grab your things and run. It's coming!"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Everyone, the bad guys are saying it's scary and they need to run, so we should probably do the same.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As this is happening, you now begin to see, lower near one of the plain areas where there's a cluster of rocks, a gray, heavy-shouldered deer-- that you've seen keep at a distance from you-- has been killed. You see four or five humanoid figures, though tall and covered in fur. You recognize them as bugbears. They're grabbing their things off the ground, and looking back in the direction you came from.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Which is back where we saw the big things.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, something's behind us!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Like the worm or something?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't know, but let's go. Let's run.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Turning around and looking back. No, the big loping creatures we saw at a distance, maybe.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They begin charging in that direction. The rain's still battering down; you can still make out, barely, the shape of it. It swoops down, parallel to where you guys are, giant talons reach out and grasp into one of the bodies and pulls it up. You hear the bugbear screaming as the talons tear it in half in its grasp. As it picks up into the air, it brings one half of its body up into its beak and begin to slurp it down into its large, sharpened maw. It picks up the other piece of its body. It begins to draw and pull out. You see some of its innards still tangled in the claw, yanked out the rest as the legs fall and plummet to the ground. They keep shouting, "Run! Run!" and they're charging. What are you guys doing?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Where are they running? To the river?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They are running towards the river.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Let them be the bait.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Does the creature see us at all?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You don't know.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: There's no grass, it's just an open plain?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, is there any rock coverage?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right now, there are bits of dried-- I want to say grass, that go about a foot off the ground.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: How far away is the river?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The river's probably another three hours of travel.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh. Oh, okay.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We could lay down and try to hide in the grass.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sure. Let's do it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: With our cloaks over us?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can certainly try.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm going to cast Major Image and create a large hairy mastodon and send it in the direction of the bugbears, away from us.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. What's the DC on that one?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Major Image?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh no, it's not even a saving throw. It has to try to see if it can discern it. Right, okay.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Against your spell save DC, so it's 16.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It rights itself and picks back up and begins to turn around to make a second turn towards it. Are you guys staying put? Are you moving?

lines.name: TRAVIS
