lines.text: We are hauling ass, right? No, we're laying flat.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We're laying flat!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay, we are laying flat. Sure.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. you guys all lay flat.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, I'm picturing the hobbits in Mordor.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You have to roll a new stealth check, because you did cast a spell.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Mm-hmm. 18?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Plus ten?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, how long does Pass Without a Trace last?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh yeah, I didn't say I recast it. It lasts for an hour.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Lasts for an hour?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh wait, let me check, it might only be ten minutes. No, I think it's an hour.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I think it's an hour too. Double check.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, its an hour.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's been a few hours. Have you been casting it along the way?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: How many spell slots do you have to cast it?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Three.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Three? You wouldn't have enough to keep it at this point, unfortunately. So it is just a straight stealth roll for you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll also cast a spell. I'll cast Silent Image and make another mastodon, running the opposite direction.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughing) Okay. For the rest of you who are stealthing, because the spell did wear off, I do need new stealth checks from everybody to try and keep away from its sight, and see if its distraction maintains itself.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Ooh. 18.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The bugbears keep running. It curves around, sees the other mastodon. Does not seem tempted by that one. That was a natural 20. As it spins back, however, still focused on the one, swoops down, and this time it's going to go into a full assault, not trying to pick it up and leave with it. It's going to come down, claws ready. It passes through, its talons slipping into the mud now. The rain that has been barreling down has caused this to become a minor quagmire. It skids for a second, its massive bird form scooting in through, driving this huge wedge into the ground as it stumbles for a minute and stops. It spins around angrily, looking at it. It steps forward and brings its talon up and bites towards it, and it's passing through the mastodon. It's not even interested in yours.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sure.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It does turn and look in your direction a little bit.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm going to hold that spell.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It just (sniffs). It definitely knows the mastodon's not real now.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (wings flapping)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It takes back off up in the air. Seeing it now amongst the ground, its wingspan probably fits more in the 60-foot tip-to-tip range.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Ooh.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (laughs) Amazing.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: If it comes close to us, if it looks like it has spotted us, I'm going to hold a spell.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm going to do the same.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It swoops around, looks.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to hold Guiding Bolt, just in case.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm going to pray.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: To?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Ioun, of course.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. It takes a moment to pass through the field, and looks back towards the bugbears, and takes off in their direction.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Hey, it's good. Now it's farther from us.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Can one of you control it and tell it to fly us to the town?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I can politely ask it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I have Charm Monster.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, you do?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You could!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, but if I fail. I get ripped into pieces! A hundred and something feet in the air!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We would definitely protect you, Fjord.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Huh?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We would protect you.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Against Rodan? I'm not so sure. What is that, anyway?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's a roc.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's a roc, man. From season one?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's not a healthy roc; it's a Xhorhasian roc. It's a different breed.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's a different kind of roc.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Alt-roc. Sorry.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That was so good!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That was dumb.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The good kind of dumb. You get points for that. You watch as it takes off in the distance, and you can vaguely hear the muffled screams as this hunting party of bugbears are probably torn asunder. It's hard to miss. Its shape dives down a few times before eventually it takes off back in the direction it came and glides overhead: this massive, airplane-like shadow across the clouded sky above you. You all stay still, and it continues heading back towards the Ashkeeper Peaks. You can just barely make out, in its claws below, one bugbear per claw.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Double-fisting!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Those are my people.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Nah, I'm just kidding. Fuck those guys.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Who were those? What are those guys?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do we know what those are?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: A bugbear? Didn't we fight them in the first encounter?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, those were gnolls.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They're generally more of a bully-- in between the ogre and goblin spectrum.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, they're physical. They like brutality and combat, but they're also kind of lazy and like to put in as little effort as possible, if they can make other goblins do it for them, and other entities. They're interesting.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Probably not terribly well-stocked, not worth going to where they were picked up from, and--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You don't know.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We should maybe just check.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: How many of the bugbears were there?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Four?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You saw four in the party.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Two, we know, were killed.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Taken away.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I think all four were--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Are dead.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I think he said they were all eviscerated, yeah? How far away was the first slaughter spot of them from us?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: From where you guys are right now, it's about a little over a hundred feet.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Maybe we don't need to do that. Maybe we don't. Cover is--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's going to do nothing but attract other scavengers anyway.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We were waiting and watching the roc until it moves on,

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And it has, so let's go.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, let's keep going.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: How often do you see anything like that?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That was pretty amazing.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, never.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You continue on forward, about 30 minutes of travel, carefully, slowly. You come upon the remnants of the bugbears that were picked up in the claws. You can see the areas where they were scattered a bit, and what was gathered for the creature to rush off with.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, ugh.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That is gruesome.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Zoinks.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There is one bugbear that is untouched, it seems, but still on the ground.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Dead? Or just laying there?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's laying there.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: But playing dead?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Let's throw something at it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can just, looking over in that direction, see the breathing a bit. It looks like it's been playing dead for a half an hour.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, no, I think he's fine. We can keep moving.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We'll just keep an eye on him as we keep walking by. I'll use Thaumaturgy and make it sound like that bird is coming back.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Wow, that's great.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: If you want, I can talk to him if we want any information?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I mean, maybe?

lines.name: SAM, TRAVIS
lines.text: Do we?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't know, what could we learn from this thing?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I don't think he is a threat to us, so it couldn't hurt.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I mean, he might...

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Are there more of them nearby, where did you come from, have you seen a giant purple worm?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: How do you cross this river?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sure.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Where do you cross?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay. Yeah, let's go chat up the bugbear.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Hello? Sleepy bear? We won't hurt you if you wake up.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No response.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We've got a pot of honey.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Ja

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You guys are speaking in Goblin?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yep. You see one of the eyes kind of creep open.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Nap time.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Ja

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No more hibernate-y.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You see the hand go for the side of its belt.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, no! We mean you no harm. No fight.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We could, but we don't mean to.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a persuasion check.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's cocked.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, it's cocked.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Because you've got so many fucking dice on your tray! You've got to sort them out.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What the fuck are you talking about?!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You've got to sort them out so you have room to roll!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I did at the top of the game. Persuasion? That is a 20.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's true; you have two by three inches of rolling space there.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's all you need.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The hand that was brushing towards the belt instead reaches out and plants itself in the mud, and then does a push-up into a sitting position, with the mud all caked into the fur on one side of the face. The rest of the fur is matted from the rain. Sits up. "You mean no harm?"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No fighting. Sorry about your friends, or family.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Well, that is life in the wastes."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: If you could help us, maybe we can give you some food.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ask him if he wants a tattoo.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I won't lead with that.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You would want to shave him first?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Sure.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yasha's good at that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He scoots back in the mud and starts trying to stand up a little bit.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, no.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No, we are

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I don't live here."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Where do you live?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "There," and points in the direction, past the river but a little bit northeast.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh! How do you get to the-- do you live on the

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yeah."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: How do you get to the other side of the river?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Swim."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is it a hard swim?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yeah."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: This guy is valuable!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do you think we could do it, or no?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Maybe."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Maybe!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I see that look in your eye. Is there a best place to cross the river, that you use?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, a place where it, I guess, widens out, so it'd be less--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, no.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Shallow, more shallow.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: More shallow.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Shallow? I don't know how water works.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's true.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "There are a few places where the river's not quite as bad, yes."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Where are those places? We have food!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I was going to say, if you can show us where that is and we can get across, once--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He can't understand you.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well, yeah, but I can say this--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is what I translate to him, yes.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We could--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Actually, he turns to you and responds in broken Common.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, shit.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well, that's convenient. If you can help us get across, I can give you some food, and if you need any healing after what just happened.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And a tattoo!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: The tattoo's optional.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's pretty cool.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: They are pretty cool, but it's optional.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I can show you across the river. But--"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can I ride you across the river?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Are we making this weird?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do you float, can I ride like a raft?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I can float, yes."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Have you ever ridden a person across the river?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Have you?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Not since I was a tiny bear, but--"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What? You have a bad back?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: This feels like a "Scorpion and the Tortoise" sort of thing, but are you the scorpion?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm always the scorpion.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "You're not from around here, are you?"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Nope.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do we look like tourists?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Very much."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is it our fanny packs?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Is it our matching cloaks?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "The bright pink one you wear around your waist?"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We do have "Xhorhas or bust" on the back of our cloaks, that might give it away.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What is your name?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "My name is Gluzzo."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Bluza?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Gluzzo."

lines.name: ALL
lines.text: Gluzzo.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So this big bird that has killed your friends, your family: are there a lot of those?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Not usually this far out from the mountains. There's some that are to the eastern "range, by the Penumbra Range, and there's some at the Ashkeepers."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So they become less of an issue in your neck of the woods,

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yeah. They don't go too far into the valley, but we were trying to go further in."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Why?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "They're paying us to. Well, they

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You've been hired by--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: The Empire?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: The bad guys.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: The Kryn.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No. The Kryn?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Dynasty, yes."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Ja.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: The Dynasty.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "They--"

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Ja

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He catches himself. There's a look of mistrust across his face. This may not be the most intelligent creature, but suddenly, he's like...

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Give him food, give him something. Do we have something? Give him something.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, here's some of the food I took from the guys. Here.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You can trust us.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do you like this? Rations?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The bugbear's probably close to Caduceus' size, though it's sitting. It doesn't look as big at this point, but as it reaches out and grabs it, its big, furred, clawed hand completely envelops yours and pulls the food out. It almost scratches the palm a little bit.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ow. Like one of those kangaroos when you feed them and they go (errk).

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: They got big-ass claws on them.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (loud chewing and smacking) "So are you going to kill me, or are you going to let me go, "or am I going to my city? What do you want from me?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We just want you to help us get across the river.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And to your city, if your city is eastward?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm really curious of how buoyant you are.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I live in the--"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, he's not from-- Are you from Ghor Dranas?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "No, no. I'm from Asarius."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: How far off from Ghor Dranas is that, do you know?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "It's on the way. Sort of. I've not been to Ghor Dranas. Asarius is the City of Beasts."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Whoa.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: City of Beasts.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "The guy that hired us isn't the nicest, but he pays well."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What did he hire you to do?

lines.name: MARISHA, TRAVIS
lines.text: Gather food.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "It's a meat and feed company. It's run by a super smart ogre man, Baron Visco. Kind of a douche."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Baron Visco?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well, Gluzzo, can you lead us, you think? We have more food we can share with you. Can you lead us to the safest place to cross your river?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I'll show you. Come on." He gets up and stands. Now, seeing him close up, it's interesting: wide shoulders, but rail-thin, furred, gaunt body. You can't tell because of the fur if it's malnourished or it's just designed to be a runner, and is just a very thin, muscular frame. Gathered by the fact it was a hunting party that wasn't expecting a roc, they're probably used to running and hunting out in these open fields fairly often. So hard to tell one way or the other. Gluzzo continues to walk forward and keeps checking over his shoulder towards you, with a look of waiting for the moment when someone shoots him in the base of the skull. He keeps walking, and keeps walking. Do you guys follow?

lines.name: ALL
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: But keeping an eye out in case we get ambushed.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: He seems all right, though?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He seems to be in a position where he doesn't have a choice; and just watched his hunting party get demolished.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: All right. He's not thinking about anything funny, though.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make an insight check.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At the moment, seems less interested in trying to cross you and just survive and get back home.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Smart.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well, when we find the place, we can all help each other cross the river, go our separate ways. Fill your belly, at least, before you go.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Continues on, quietly. A few hours of travel in the heavy rain, you begin to come upon the river itself. The banks are extremely muddy, with a black, deep brown, bits of red mud to it, and even a hundred feet out from the bank the typical muddy walk you've had here through the wastes becomes very (sucking squelching). You find your boots being tugged at and almost pulled off at times, and as you get right up towards the river, it's not a

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Will you go first, or should we go first?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I can go first if you-- I'm going there anyway."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You can also--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll be fine, but do you guys want to tie a rope around this fellow?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I was going to say, we can tie a rope around you and then you could secure at the other side of the--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It would be easier to get across.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, yeah. I'll do that.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: There's also several of us that can, you know, mess with water.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Ah. Fjord, that's your very special power that only you have.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Honestly, I don't have it prepared, Fjord, so you are very special right now.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I hate her.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We can make a rope tether, though, if we have to.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Would you like to use your very special power, or should I just carry a rope across?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you guys are having this conversation, Gluzzo seems to have dropped onto his knees and bowed his head quietly for a moment and is holding something in his hand.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What's going on? Are you praying?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He stays quiet for a minute. Opens his eyes again and you see glimmers of a chain lost in fur as he tucks something under his fur.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is he naked?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Just his large, furred feet. Mostly lower-half naked; but it's mostly fur in the area.

lines.name: LAURA, MARISHA
lines.text: He's shirt cocking?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Armor cocking, technically.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And he just hid the medallion in his own Robert Guccione mass of chest hair?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Who were you praying to?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "To the Light."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Who?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Goliath?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "The Light."

lines.name: LAURA, SAM, MARISHA
lines.text: The Light.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Stands up and begins to wade out into the water. He's swimming and fighting the stream.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Go, Nott. Unless Fjord--?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm going to tag along. Fjord, do you want to do anything?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Not me.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I've got the rope. I'm holding one end of the rope if you're going to hold the other.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, go.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay. I'll take the rope across.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Gluzzo, surprisingly strong. Fights the current; even though it moves along, he manages to still make his way across. Big armfuls of water, breaststroke style. He makes it across at an angle and eventually stands up amongst the muck on the opposite end.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Let's tack them down if we can.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes, is there anything to tie off the--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Don't we have some spikes?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: In the mud? I think it would come undone.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: In the immediate vicinity, there's nothing to really tie it to. What few rocks are there are, are small enough to the point that it would just be pulled out with any--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well, at the very least we can have strong people hold the ropes on either side.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Maybe Gluzzo can hold the rope on the other side.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't know how this works, but I'm going to try to walk across the super-fast-moving current of water.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And you do. You run across; and as you do, it's like running sideways on the moving pathways in an airport. Moving forward, but you're watching your entire perspective shift down that way. It gets a bit bumpy at times as your feet hit where parts of the water are cresting and hitting stones or whitewater is starting to splash, so it's a little uneven. It's an interesting sensation, but eventually you run across.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Hey, made it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Gluzzo is on the other side like, (whew).

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Gluzzo, do you mind holding this end of the rope so that my friends can join us?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Grabs the end of the rope and wraps it around the forearm and holds it there.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right everyone. Come across!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Good job, Nott! I'll use Control Water to part the river for a hundred feet in either direction and create a nice line of dry land to the other side.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. You watch as the river parts and halts itself there. The flow of the river suspended for the time being and you can now see the muddy walkway that is the base of the river. Dozens and dozens of smooth river stones cluster in the bottom and you can see protruding roots of other leaves and bushes that were washed in and sunk down and stuck in the muck, but it is traversable.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Are there any particularly attractive river stones down there?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There's a few.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to pick a couple up when I walk across.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You gather a couple of pretty river stones.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: How much time do we have to cross this?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Ten minutes.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's good. I'm going to start walking.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Ten long minutes.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Keep going, everyone! I'm here in case his magic fails.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys all make your way across and Gluzzo sits there staring at you, Nott, looks at the rope and goes, "Do I have to keep holding onto this?"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, it was just a back up. Our leader, Caleb, made sure that Fjord controlled the water so we're okay.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Caleb, to humor Nott, has used the rope the whole way, walking along.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Thank you so much.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I also think I'm going to poke my head in the river in one of the walls just to see what's happening on the other side of it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Roll-- no, I'm kidding.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (splashing) Really?!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's very cold water. It is murky, but not unpleasant. You glance in and you think you catch a glimmer of what might have been a fish swimming along in it, but there's so little light here amongst the darkened clouds and the storm above that you see it and it's gone and you're not even sure if your brain made it up.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's great. All right, fair enough.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You make your way across the river. Gluzzo tosses the rope back to you and turns around and starts making the walk continuously. There's unique balance between wanting to help to survive and not be killed by you, and also seemingly really put out by anything you ask him to do.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: This is a common refrain from anyone we've ever met.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, but usually you've earned it. This is right off the bat.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I feel like we owe him a bag of food at least.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, can we give him some more? Or give him a taste?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We'll give him one of the ration kits.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: This is how you know we are not going to kill you, because we would not be dumping our food into you before we-- we're not fattening you up for-- you know.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I feel like you really let that trail on.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Are we just going to let him go, then?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: How much further is Ghor Dranas? How many days' walk?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Ghor Dranas from here? From Asarius is maybe, at a pretty fast speed, about two weeks?"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, no.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Are there any beasts of burden that we could rent?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Maybe in Asarius."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Maybe we should make a stop.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do you think if we go there, people are going to kill us right away?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's a fair bet.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You said a city of beasts, didn't you?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yes. Well, are you with the Empire?"

lines.name: SAM, LAURA
lines.text: No.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Mostly unaffiliated.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No. We're just hanging out. We like it here.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You'll probably be okay. You'll probably be okay."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What about the tall woman?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "You might be okay." Looks to Yasha, Beau, and Caduceus. "We do have humans that do come "through, but they're usually-- well, they're pretty well-connected with the Dynasty."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We are totally going into this city now.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We can do some crafty disguises.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I don't know. You can do the crafty disguise on yourself, right, Nott?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I can, yes, but I won't need to.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can I borrow your armor? Your glamour?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It'll change what you're wearing.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's a start, you could make some of that insect-like armor, hmm?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: The glamour armor?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You could change what it looks like.

lines.name: LAURA, MARISHA
lines.text: Just the clothes.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Have you used it to put a hat on yourself? Could you make one of those insect-like helmets?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I have not tried that.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Or any helmet, really.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We could-- hmm, nope. Caleb can disguise himself.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So can literally everybody else in our party.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, I pull out that ugly mask that I bought. You could put this on!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What's that? What is it?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: The mask that I bought, remember?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's a metallic, angry, monster scowl mask.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No, this feels weird.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Hey! Would that look like it fits in better?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Maybe a little bit. I mean, I'm going to be honest. We're in a wartime, so if they're not "familiar with you, and you don't convince them well, probably going to kill you."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: But we're with you! And you'll vouch for us.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Also, we don't all need to go into the city if we're just acquiring transport, right?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's true. We could just send in a party.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: How far off is your city? This City of Beasts.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Otherwise, tomorrow morning."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's not too long. I don't know if I like the idea of diverting just to get some creatures to ride, but that is not long at all.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We should do it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: So some of us go into town and try to get a wagon.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: The rest will stay just outside.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, but I'm going to point out the fact that those other people that we talked to that were definitely also not with the Empire totally said that the best way to travel was on foot because if you were on any kind of animal, you would attract more attention.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's fair.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is that true? Is riding something bad news around here?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I mean, it'll be easier to see us.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "If you can go faster than what you're trying to avoid, you might be okay, but otherwise, "you know." He points back towards where the roc was.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Roc's pretty fast.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "But the rocs don't usually come this close to center of the valley."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's true.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We're talking about two weeks on foot, though, and we're going to be walking forever.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Let's get some horses.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Lead on. We'll stop short. You don't need to walk us into your own city. Just get us close to the outskirts. That would be good enough.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Do you have any money?"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I was about to ask that. What currency?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "It's somewhat bartering, but gold is always useful. There is trade that is done outside of Xhorhas."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We have lots of things.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We have gold.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Gold, I think, is useful to the Kryn, so could you help me with some gold?"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh yeah. Sure.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Here, I'll flick him a gold.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: A gold.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yep.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: A

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: If you get us there, might be more of that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Okay."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'll give him

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Okay." (laughter)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Sweet. I'm going to shave--

lines.name: LIAM, TRAVIS, SAM
lines.text: Yasha.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Let's do this when we camp. You can, once we set up camp.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Serious Skyrim Jarl vibes from this bugbear.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Are you pressing through the night or are you bedding down for the evening?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: If it's more flat plains, then--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's all flat plains here, man.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We'll stop well shy of the city then. As soon as it's just barely visible, we'll stop out there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. As nightfall hits and a few more hours pushing on, the weather, the exhaustion, it all starts to get to you and you feel the need to bed down pretty soon without pushing yourself beyond a comfortable boundary. You begin to set up your space, and Gluzzo rakes a bit of the ground open and creates a small sleeping convex hole to curl into.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's so cute.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: But nevertheless, you bed down for the evening.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I feel like I should pop the dome around him so that when we stay up to watch, he's not going to run off in the middle of the night.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We are so trusting. Look at us! We meet friends wherever we go. We met a monster and made him our friend. We're good people.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Are you trying to convince us or you?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No! I'm just saying we should take a moment to realize people like us.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm proud of everybody.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We might have been partially responsible for getting all the Muck Men killed, but--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (shushing)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Jester, what do you need to complete this tattoo?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Just him shaved. That is it. Where would you like a tattoo, sir?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Looks around his body.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Go for the neck.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Remember, you will be bald there for some time. Somewhere that the hair doesn't grow very thick would be good.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Just around under the ear.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Points to the side of the chest.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's good. That's a trendy spot.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Do you first use your window opener to make a bit of (accented) lather?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: My window opener?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Your spell. You open all the windows.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Thaumaturgy?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Ja

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I don't think I can shave him with Thaumaturgy.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No, lather. Shaving cream.

lines.name: TRAVIS, LAURA
lines.text: Oh,

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I don't think Thaumaturgy will create lather, either.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No. It would just make the sound of lather coming out of a canister, but nothing actually will come out.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You cannot make a little bit of water with it?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You are the transmuter.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I don't know everything in the world.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I can make water.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Just work up a foam. Just a little bit of--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yasha just walks over and points the giant sword at the bugbear and is like, "Arm up."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Okay."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (rough scraping)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Performance check. Is his scalp removed?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's a simple tattoo.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It is a pretty simple tattoo.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What are you going to tattoo?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Captain Tusktooth.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: She got a thing.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I got to make a trail wherever we go.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The googly-eyed Captain Tusktooth?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Obviously.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you all prepare for the evening's rest, by the light of, I assume, probably a Light spell or that same globe within the dome, you begin to slowly affix the next marker of Captain Tusktooth against the torso of this lone bugbear as he sits there and rubs on his whatever it is he has around his neck.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm pretty close. Can I see what the symbol is as I'm tattooing?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a perception check.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You get glimmers of it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (gasps) Whispers?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Shit!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Late in the night whispers? Happy Valentine's Day everybody! May all your whispers be romantic and not about bugbears. She gasped! We're all dying. This is a devil bear.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We're all going to die.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Whoa. What? I'm not going to say it out loud. I'm tattooing him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a-- I'll say, given the circumstances, a general dexterity check.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, it's for the tattoo.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's not a very detailed tattoo. It is not the greatest canvas under the greatest circumstances, but you figure for tattooing a bugbear in the middle of the Xhorhasian fields in a rainstorm, it's not too bad.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I think it looks good.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's passable.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Getting better!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Thank you.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's all that matted hair and stuff still left behind.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's hard to work around it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It looks like Gritty, basically, with all the brown hair around it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Before I finish the tusks, can I go over and: Fjord, can I look at your tusks?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can I look at your mouth?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I pull his lip down. Are they pointy or are they still filed?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: They're doing their thing.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Are they like this?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They're starting to grow, yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to do one of them a normal tusk and then the other tusk is a little blunted tusk on this guy.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Thanks.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's where we'll leave tonight's episode.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Maybe we can spend a little time here? Just a little? I don't know, faster than maybe, say, Darktow?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You don't want to piss off the whole city and leave the same day?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: In and out. 12 hours. In and ex-out.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Two hours later: "And stay out!"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Amazing island of pirates? Never come back. Never see anything. You motherfucker!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Indeed.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Awesome stuff.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That was a thing.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wow. Who knew that we would be friends with a bugbear in the middle of Xhorhas today?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So cute! I love him.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Remember the last time that we befriended an evil creature and everything went really well?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Are bugbears evil?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What's around his neck?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm not going to tell you right now.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: She's not going to tell us right now, she's going to be Laura.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Anyway.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Good game, Matt.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: [music]
